Brush the dough with oil and sprinkle it with black sesame seeds. Place the dough directly on the heated surface of a deck oven at 485F (252C) or place the sheet pan of dough on a rack in the oven. Bake until the breads are well browned and crisp, approximately 10 to 12 minutes. To prevent a soggy crust, open the oven door or vent during the last two minutes of baking to remove any excess steam that may build up in the oven. Cool the loaves on cooling racks, then serve immediately.

fields.name: Gratin of Fresh Berries with Crme Frache
fields.ingredient_amount: {'grand-marnier': ['grand marnier', '1 tsp', 'grand-marnier'], 'raspberries': ['raspberries', '2 oz', 'raspberries'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'blackberries': ['blackberries', '1 oz', 'blackberries'], 'blueberries': ['blueberries', '1 oz', 'blueberries'], 'cra-me-fraa-che': ['crÃ¨me fraÃ®che', '2 fl oz', 'cra-me-fraa-che']}
fields.directions: Arrange the berries in an even layer in a shallow, heatproof serving dish. Stir the crme frache and orange liqueur together. Spoon this mixture over the berries. Sprinkle the sugar over the crme. Place under a broiler or salamander just until the sugar melts. Serve immediately.

fields.name: Garden Frittata
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '1 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'cheese-monterey-jack': ['monterey jack cheese', '1 oz', 'cheese-monterey-jack'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '3 ea', 'eggs'], 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless': ['boneless skinless chicken breast', '2 oz', 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '1 oz', 'onion-green'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin to taste', '', 'cumin-ground'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'pepper-red-bell': ['red bell pepper', '1 oz', 'pepper-red-bell'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1/2 fl oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '2 tsp', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'pepper-jalapeno-chile': ['jalapeno chile pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-jalapeno-chile']}
fields.directions: Rub the chicken breast with the garlic, cumin, salt and pepper. Grill or broil the chicken until done. Allow it to rest briefly, then cut it into strips. In a well-seasoned 9-inch (22-centimeter) saut pan, saut the mushrooms in the butter until tender. Add the jalapeo and saut for 30 seconds. Add the chicken, bell pepper, green onions and cilantro and saut until hot. Add the eggs and season with salt and pepper. Cook the mixture, stirring and lifting the eggs to help them cook evenly, until they begin to set. Sprinkle the cheese over the eggs and place under a salamander or broiler to melt the cheese and finish cooking the eggs. Slide the frittata onto a plate or cut into wedges for smaller por-tions.

fields.name: Garlic Croutons
fields.ingredient_amount: {'basil-dried-ground': ['dried ground basil', '2 tsp', 'basil-dried-ground'], 'bread-french': ['French bread', '1, 8 lb', 'bread-french'], 'cheese-parmesan': ['parmesan cheese', '1 oz', 'cheese-parmesan'], 'butter': ['butter', '6 oz', 'butter'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'oregano-dried-ground': ['dried ground oregano', '2 tsp', 'oregano-dried-ground']}
fields.directions: Melt the butter in a small saucepan and add the garlic. Cook the garlic in the butter over low heat for 5 minutes. Place the bread cubes in a bowl; add the Parmesan and herbs. Pour the garlic butter over the bread cubes and immediately toss to combine. Spread the bread cubes on a sheet pan in a single layer and bake at 350F (180C). Stir the croutons occasionally and cook until dry and lightly browned, approximately 15 minutes.

fields.name: Fish Fumet
fields.ingredient_amount: {'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '12 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter'], 'onion': ['onion', '1 lb', 'onion'], 'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '24 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'lemon': ['lemon', '10 slice', 'lemon'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '2 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'water': ['water', '7 qt', 'water'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 sprig', 'thyme-fresh'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '2 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'fish-bones': ['fish bones', '10 lb', 'fish-bones']}
fields.directions: Melt the butter in a stockpot. Add the onions, parsley stems and fish bones. Cover the pot and sweat the bones over low heat. Sprinkle the bones with the wine and lemon juice. Add the cold water or stock, mushroom trimmings, thyme and lemon slices. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer and cook approximately 30 minutes, skimming frequently. Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Whole-Wheat Bread
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1/2 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'milk-nonfat-dry': ['nonfat dry milk', '1 1/4 oz', 'milk-nonfat-dry'], 'flour-whole-wheat': ['whole wheat flour', '1, 10 lb', 'flour-whole-wheat'], 'water': ['water', '17 fl oz', 'water'], 'butter': ['butteras needed', '', 'butter'], 'honey': ['honey', '3 oz', 'honey'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Combine the salt and milk powder with 12 ounces (360 grams) flour in a large mixer bowl. Stir in the water, yeast, honey and softened butter. Beat until combined into a thick batterlike dough. Add the remaining flour 2 ounces (60 grams) at a time. Knead on medium speed approxi-mately 8 minutes until the dough is smooth and elastic. Place the dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover. Let the dough ferment in a warm place until doubled. Punch down, portion and shape as desired. Let the shaped dough proof until doubled. Bake at 375F (190C) until firm and dark brown, approximately 1 hour for loaves and 20 minutes for rolls. Brush the top of the loaves or rolls with melted butter after baking.

fields.name: Phyllo Crisps
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butter', '4 oz', 'butter'], 'phyllo-dough': ['phyllo dough', '8 sheet', 'phyllo-dough'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-confectioners']}
fields.directions: 1 Line a full-size sheet pan with parchment paper and brush with melted butter. Dust with powdered sugar and place two sheets of phyllo dough side by side on the pan. 2 Brush the phyllo sheets with butter and dust with powdered sugar. Place a second phyllo sheet on top of each of the first sheets, brush them with butter and dust with powdered sugar. Continue until there are two stacks of phyllo dough, each four layers high. 3 Using a pastry wheel, cut each stack of phyllo into four columns and four rows, creating 16 small rectangular stacks of phyllo dough from each large stack. 4 Cover the phyllo stacks with parchment paper and another sheet pan. Bake at 325F (160C) until brown, approximately 15 minutes. Remove and cool.

fields.name: Breadsticks
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1/2 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'egg-wash': ['Egg Washas needed', '', 'egg-wash'], 'sesame-seeds': ['sesame seeds', '3 tbl', 'sesame-seeds'], 'flour-bread': ['bread flour', '1, 2 lb', 'flour-bread'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '4 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'water': ['water', '10 fl oz', 'water'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Stir the yeast, water and sugar together in a mixer bowl. Blend in the oil, salt and 8 ounces (240 grams) flour. Gradually add the remaining flour. Knead the dough until it is smooth and cleans the sides of the bowl, approximately 5 minutes. Remove the dough from the bowl and allow it to rest for a few minutes. Roll the dough into a rectangle, about 1/4 inch (6 millimeters) thick. Cut the dough into 24 even pieces. Roll each piece into a rope and twist; bring the ends together, allowing the sides to curl together. Place on a paper-lined sheet pan. Brush with egg wash and top with sesame seeds. Let the sticks rise until doubled, approximately 20 minutes.

fields.name: American Pound Cake
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lemon-extract': ['lemon extract', '1 tsp', 'lemon-extract'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '2 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '9 oz', 'eggs'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'flour-cake': ['cake flour', '1 lb', 'flour-cake'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '12 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Sift the flour, baking powder and salt together. Set aside. Cream the butter until light and lump-free. Add the sugar and cream until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, scraping down the bowl frequently and mixing well after each addition. Stir in the extracts. Fold in the dry ingredients by hand in three stages. Divide the batter into greased loaf pans. Spread evenly with a spatula. Bake at 325F (160C) until golden brown and springy to the touch, approximately 1 hour and 10 minutes. VARIATION: French-Style FruitcakeAdd 6 ounces (180 grams) finely diced nuts, raisins and candied fruit to the batter. Substitute vanilla extract for the lemon extract and add 1 1/2 fluid ounces (45 milliliters) rum to the batter. After baking, brush the warm cake with additional rum.

fields.name: Chipotle Pure
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chipotle-peppers-canned': ['canned chipotle peppers', '7 oz', 'chipotle-peppers-canned'], 'lime-juice-fresh': ['Lime Juice (fresh)', '2 tbl', 'lime-juice-fresh'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable']}
fields.directions: Place all the ingredients in the bowl of a food processor and process until smooth.

fields.name: Biscotti
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chocolate-semisweet': ['semisweet chocolateas needed', '', 'chocolate-semisweet'], 'hazelnut-flour': ['hazelnut flour', '10 oz', 'hazelnut-flour'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '2 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1 tbl', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'hazelnuts-whole-unblanched': ['whole unblanched hazelnuts', '10 oz', 'hazelnuts-whole-unblanched'], 'flour-pastry': ['pastry flour', '1 lb', 'flour-pastry'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '8 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'almond-flour': ['almond flour', '3 oz', 'almond-flour'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '5 ea', 'eggs'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 lb', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Sift together the cinnamon and ammonium carbonate or baking powder. Stir in the hazelnut, almond and pastry flours. Set aside. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs and sugar to the ribbon stage, approximately 3 minutes. Add the butter. Stir in the flour mixture with a rubber spatula, then stir in the whole hazelnuts. Divide the dough into three even pieces. Refrigerate until cold. Roll each piece of dough into a 12-inch (30-centimeter) log. Place on a paper-lined sheet pan, leaving at least 3 inches (7.5 centimeters) of space between each log. Bake at 350F (180C) until golden in color, approximately 20 minutes. Cool the logs, then slice them into 1-inch- (3-centimeter-) thick slices. Place the sliced cookies upright on paper-lined sheet pans. Double-tray the pans. Reduce heat to 325F (160C) and bake until the biscotti are thoroughly crisp, approximately 40 minutes. Once cool, the biscotti may be dipped in tempered chocolate. VARIATIONS: Orange BiscottiAdd 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) grated orange zest to the flour mixture. Anise BiscottiAdd 1 teaspoon (5 milliliters) chopped anise seeds to the flour mixture. Chocolate BiscottiReplace 5 ounces (150 grams) pastry flour with cocoa powder. Add 1/2 tea-spoon (2 milliliters) coffee extract and 1/2 teaspoon (2 milliliters) cinnamon to the flour mixture.

fields.name: Lime Chiffon
fields.ingredient_amount: {'egg-whites-pasteurized': ['pasteurized egg whites', '4 ea', 'egg-whites-pasteurized'], 'lime-zest': ['Lime Zest', '1 tbl', 'lime-zest'], 'gelatin-powdered': ['powdered gelatin', '1/4 oz', 'gelatin-powdered'], 'lime-juice-fresh': ['Lime Juice (fresh)', '3 fl oz', 'lime-juice-fresh'], 'egg-yolks-pasteurized': ['pasteurized egg yolks', '4 ea', 'egg-yolks-pasteurized'], 'water': ['water', '5 fl oz', 'water'], 'crumb-pie-crust': ['Crumb Pie Crust', '1 ea', 'crumb-pie-crust'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '7 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Soften the gelatin in 1 fluid ounce (30 milliliters) water. Combine 4 ounces (120 grams) sugar with the remaining water, lime juice, lime zest and egg yolks in a bowl over a pan of simmering water. Whisk the egg-and-lime mixture together vigorously until it begins to thicken. Add the sof-tened gelatin and continue whipping until very thick and foamy. Remove from the heat, cover and refrigerate until cool and as thick as whipping cream. Meanwhile, whip the egg whites to soft peaks. Whip in the remaining sugar and continue whipping until stiff but not dry. Fold the whipped egg whites into the egg-and-lime mixture. Pour into serving dishes or a prepared pie crust and chill for several hours, until firm. Note: Can replace Crumb Pie Crust with other type pie crust VARIATIONS: Lemon ChiffonSubstitute lemon juice and lemon zest for the lime juice and zest. Orange ChiffonSubstitute orange juice for the lime juice and for 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) water. Substitute orange zest for the lime zest. Reduce the amount of sugar in the egg yolk mixture to 1 ounce (30 grams).

fields.name: Sour Cream Coffeecake
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 1/2 tbl', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '1 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1 tbl', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'pecan-halves': ['pecan halves', '4 oz', 'pecan-halves'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/4 tsp', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'cream-sour': ['sour cream', '8 oz', 'cream-sour'], 'flour-cake': ['cake flour', '7 oz', 'flour-cake'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '4 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'baking-soda': ['baking soda', '1 tsp', 'baking-soda'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: To make the filling, blend all the filling ingredients together in a small bowl. Set aside. To make the cake batter, cream the butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the sour cream. Stir until smooth. Sift the sifted flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda together twice. Stir into the batter. Stir in the vanilla extract. Spoon half of the batter into a greased tube pan. Top with half of the filling. Cover the filling with the remaining batter and top with the remaining filling. Bake at 350F (180C) for ap-proximately 35 minutes.

fields.name: White Chicken Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '8 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'chicken-backs-and-necks': ['chicken backs and necks', '15 lb', 'chicken-backs-and-necks']}
fields.directions: Cut the washed bones into pieces approximately 34 inches (810 centimeters) long. Place the bones in a stockpot and cover them with cold water. If blanching, bring the water to a boil, skimming off the scum that rises to the surface. Drain off the water and the impurities. Then add the 3 gallons (11.5 liters) cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. If not blanching the bones, bring the cold water to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and skim the scum that forms. Add the mirepoix and sachet to the simmering stock. Continue simmering and skimming the stock for 6 to 8 hours. (If only chicken bones are used, simmer for 3 to 4 hours.) Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Beurre Mani
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butter', '1 lb', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose']}
fields.directions: Knead butter and flour together until smooth. Form the mixture into pea-sized balls, then whisk the mixture gradually into a simmering sauce.

fields.name: Crme Chiboust
fields.ingredient_amount: {'gelatin-sheet': ['sheet gelatin', '1/4 oz', 'gelatin-sheet'], 'cream-of-tartar': ['cream of tartar', '1/8 tsp', 'cream-of-tartar'], 'vanilla-bean': ['vanilla bean', '1/2 ea', 'vanilla-bean'], 'milk': ['milk', '6 fl oz', 'milk'], 'water': ['water', '1 1/2 fl oz', 'water'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '3 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'cornstarch': ['cornstarch', '2 tbl', 'cornstarch'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '3 ea', 'egg-whites'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: 1 Prepare a pastry cream by heating the milk and vanilla bean just to a boil. Whisk the egg yolks, 3 tablespoons (45 milliliters) sugar and the cornstarch together. Temper with one-third of the hot milk, then return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over moderate heat until thick. Allow the pastry cream to boil briefly to properly gelatinize the starch. Remove the cream from the heat and transfer to a clean bowl. 2 Stir the softened gelatin into the hot cream. Cover and set aside, but do not chill the cream or allow it to set while preparing the Italian meringue. 3 Prepare an Italian meringue as described on page 1173 using the remaining ingredients. Whip the meringue just until the hot syrup is incorporated, approximately 1 minute.

fields.name: Madeira Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'wine-madeira': ['Madeira wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-madeira'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 qt', 'demi-glace']}
fields.directions: Bring demi-glace to a boil and reduce slightly. Then add 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) Madeira wine. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Chocolate Souffls
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chocolate-bittersweet': ['bittersweet chocolate', '8 oz', 'chocolate-bittersweet'], 'grand-marnier': ['grand marnier', '2 fl oz', 'grand-marnier'], 'orange-juice': ['orange juice', '1 pt', 'orange-juice'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '8 ea', 'eggs'], 'butter': ['butteras needed', '', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '3 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugaras needed', '', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: To prepare the base, heat the orange juice to lukewarm in a heavy saucepan. Whisk the egg yolks with 3 ounces (90 grams) sugar in a large mixing bowl. Whisk in the flour and warm orange juice, then return the mixture to the saucepan. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until the custard is thick. Do not allow it to boil. Remove from the heat. Stir in the chocolate until completely melted. Stir in the liqueur. Cover this base mixture with plastic wrap to prevent a skin from forming. Hold for use at room temperature. (Unused base can be kept overnight in the refrigerator; it should be brought to room temperature before mixing with the egg whites.) To prepare the souffls, brush 4-fluid-ounce (120-milliliter) ramekins with melted butter and dust with granulated sugar. Preheat the oven to 425F (220C). Place a sheet pan in the oven, onto which you will place the souffls for baking. (This makes it easier to remove the hot souffl cups from the oven.) Whip the egg whites to stiff peaks with the remaining 1 ounce (30 grams) sugar. Fold the whites into the chocolate base and spoon the mixture into the prepared ramekins. The ramekins should be filled to within 1/4 inch (6 millimeters) of the rim. Smooth the top of each souffl with a spatula and bake immediately. The souffls are done when well risen, brown on top and the edges appear dry, approximately 12 minutes. Do not touch a souffl to test doneness. Sprinkle the souffls with powdered sugar if desired and serve immediately.

fields.name: Crme Brle
fields.ingredient_amount: {'tulipe-cookies': ['Tulipe Cookiesas needed', '', 'tulipe-cookies'], 'vanilla-bean': ['vanilla bean', '2 ea', 'vanilla-bean'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '2 qt', 'cream-heavy'], 'raspberries': ['raspberriesas needed', '', 'raspberries'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '50 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugaras needed', '', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Place the cream and the vanilla beans in a large, heavy saucepan. Heat just to a boil. Whisk the egg yolks and sugar together until smooth and well blended. Temper the egg mixture with one-third of the hot cream. Return the egg mixture to the sauce-pan and cook, stirring constantly, until very thick. Do not allow the custard to boil. Remove from the heat and strain into a clean bowl. Cool over an ice bath, stirring occasionally. To serve, place fresh berries in the bottom of each Tulipe Cookie cup. Top with several spoonsful of custard. Sprinkle granulated sugar over the top of the custard and caramelize with a propane torch. Serve immediately. VARIATION: Passion Fruit Crme BrleReplace 1/2 quart (500 milliliters) cream with 1/2 quart (500 milliliters) frozen, thawed passion fruit pure.

fields.name: Hungarian Goulash
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-stew-meat': ['Beef Stew Meat', '5 lb', 'beef-stew-meat'], 'white-stock': ['White Stock', '1 qt', 'white-stock'], 'onion': ['onion', '2 lb', 'onion'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '4 oz', 'tomato-paste'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '4 tbl', 'paprika'], 'caraway-seed-whole': ['whole caraway seed', '1/2 tsp', 'caraway-seed-whole'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'lard': ['lard', '2 oz', 'lard'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Saut the onions in the lard or oil, browning lightly. Add the paprika, garlic, caraway seeds, salt and pepper; mix well. Add the stock and tomato paste. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Add the meat and continue simmering until the meat is very tender, approximately 112 hours. Adjust the seasonings and serve with buttered egg noodles or mashed potatoes.

fields.name: Cheese Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'ba-chamel': ['BÃ©chamel', '1 qt', 'ba-chamel'], 'mustard-dry': ['dry mustard', '1 tbl', 'mustard-dry'], 'worcestershire-sauce': ['worcestershire sauce to taste', '', 'worcestershire-sauce'], 'cheese-cheddar': ['cheddar cheese', '8 oz', 'cheese-cheddar'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Add to bchamel 8 ounces (240 grams) grated Cheddar or American cheese, a dash of Worcestershire sauce and 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) dry mustard.

fields.name: Vanilla Custard Sauce (Crme Anglaise)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vanilla-bean': ['vanilla bean', '1 ea', 'vanilla-bean'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '12 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'cream-half-half': ['half & half cream', '1 qt', 'cream-half-half'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '10 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Using a heavy nonreactive saucepan, bring the half-and-half and vanilla bean just to a boil. Whisk the egg yolks and sugar together in a mixing bowl. Temper the egg mixture with ap-proximately one-third of the hot half-and-half, then return the entire mixture to the saucepan with the remaining half-and-half. Cook the sauce over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon. Do not allow the sauce to exceed 185F (85C) or the mixture will curdle. As soon as the sauce thickens, remove it from the heat and pour it through a fine mesh strain-er into a clean bowl. Chill the sauce in an ice bath, then cover and keep refrigerated. The sauce should last 3 to 4 days. VARIATIONS: Chocolate Custard SauceStir 6 ounces (180 grams) finely chopped dark chocolate into the strained custard while it is still warm. The heat of the custard will melt the chocolate. Coffee Custard SauceAdd 11 1/2 fluid ounces (3045 milliliters) coffee (caf) extract or com-pound to the warm custard. Frangelico Custard SauceOmit the vanilla bean. Stir in 1/2 teaspoon (2 milliliters) vanilla ex-tract and 23 tablespoons (3045 milliliters) Frangelico,  to taste. Ginger Custard SauceOmit the vanilla bean. Steep 3 ounces (90 grams) chopped fresh ginger for 10 minutes in the half-and-half. Reheat and continue preparing the sauce as directed. The chopped ginger will be strained out in Step 4. Pistachio Custard SauceOmit the vanilla bean. Place 4 ounces (120 grams) finely chopped pistachio nuts in the saucepan with the barely boiling half-and-half. Remove from the heat, cover and steep for up to 1 hour. Uncover the mixture, reheat and continue preparing the sauce as directed. The ground nuts will be strained out in Step 4.

fields.name: Flaky Pie Dough
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-granulated'], 'flour-pastry': ['pastry flour', '1, 6 lb', 'flour-pastry'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '4 fl oz', 'buttermilk'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tbl', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: Cut butter into medium dice 38 inch (9 millimeters) square. Sift the flour onto a work surface or into a large bowl. Cut the butter into the flour mixture until fat is size of peas or peanuts Combine the buttermilk, salt, sugar and vanilla (if using) in a bowl with a whisk. Gradually add the buttermilk to the flour mixture. Mix gently until the dough holds together. Do not overmix or add too much liquid. Cover the dough with plastic wrap and chill thoroughly before using.

fields.name: Scrambled Eggs
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '2 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '12 ea', 'eggs'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '2 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Combine the eggs, cream, salt and pepper in a mixing bowl. Whisk until well blended. Heat the butter in a saut pan. Pour the egg mixture into the hot pan and cook, stirring frequently, until set, approximately 2 minutes. The eggs should be set, but still shiny and moist.

fields.name: Lemongrass Mayonnaise
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirin': ['mirin', '1 tbl', 'mirin'], 'fish-sauce': ['fish sauce', '1 tsp', 'fish-sauce'], 'vinegar-rice': ['rice vinegar', '1 1/2 tbl', 'vinegar-rice'], 'lemongrass-oil': ['Lemongrass Oil', '10 fl oz', 'lemongrass-oil'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '2 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'soy-sauce': ['soy sauce', '1 tsp', 'soy-sauce']}
fields.directions: Place all of the ingredients except the Lemongrass Oil into a food processor or blender and process for 30 seconds or until well blended. With the processor running, drizzle in the oil to form an emulsion.

fields.name: Brown Roux
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '8 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '8 oz', 'clarified-butter']}
fields.directions: Heat the clarified butter in a saut pan or rondeau over medium heat. Add the flour and mix thoroughly. Reduce the heat to low. For brown roux, stir constantly until the roux is the color of peanut butter and has a nutty aroma, about 20 minutes. NOTE: For a soup consistency, use about 12 ounces (336 grams) of roux per gallon (3.8 liters) of liquid. For a sauce consistency, use about 16 ounces (450 grams) of roux per gallon (3.8 liters) of liquid.

fields.name: Warm Baked Peaches or Nectarines
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vanilla-bean': ['vanilla bean', '1 ea', 'vanilla-bean'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'peaches': ['peaches', '4 ea', 'peaches'], 'pastry-cream-cra-me-pa-tissia-re': ['Pastry Cream (CrÃ¨me PÃ¢tissiÃ¨re)as needed', '', 'pastry-cream-cra-me-pa-tissia-re']}
fields.directions: Cut the peaches or nectarines in half. Remove the pits. Place them, cut side up, in a well-buttered half-size hotel pan or ovenproof dish. Split the vanilla bean and scrape the seeds into the sugar. Sprinkle the fruit with the sugar and lemon juice. Place a small piece of butter in the center of each fruit half and bake at 350F (180C) until tender and lightly browned, approximately 20 minutes. Serve warm with Pastry Cream or ice cream.

fields.name: Ivory Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'glace-de-volaille': ['Glace de Volaille', '3 fl oz', 'glace-de-volaille'], 'supra-me-sauce': ['SuprÃªme Sauce', '1 qt', 'supra-me-sauce'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Add to suprme sauce 3 fluid ounces (90 milliliters) glace de volaille. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Pesto Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cheese-romano': ['romano cheese', '4 oz', 'cheese-romano'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '12 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'cheese-parmesan': ['parmesan cheese', '4 oz', 'cheese-parmesan'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'pine-nuts': ['pine nuts', '3 oz', 'pine-nuts'], 'basil-fresh': ['fresh basil', '6 oz', 'basil-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Place one-third of the oil in a blender or food processor and add all the remaining ingredients. Blend or process until smooth. Add the remaining oil and blend a few seconds to incorporate. VARIATIONS: Walnut PestoSubstitute walnuts for pine nuts. Sun-Dried Tomato PestoAdd 1 ounce (30 grams) sun-dried tomatoes that have been softened in oil or water. Add additional oil as necessary.

fields.name: Orange Rind
fields.ingredient_amount: {'oranges': ['oranges', '1 ea', 'oranges']}
fields.directions: Wash orange.                                                                                      2) Peel orange rind, avoiding white pith.                                         3) Dice or julienne with sharp knife

fields.name: Risotto Milanese
fields.ingredient_amount: {'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'onion': ['onion', '5 oz', 'onion'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '2 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'butter': ['butter', '6 oz', 'butter'], 'cheese-parmesan': ['parmesan cheese', '4 oz', 'cheese-parmesan'], 'water': ['water', '2 fl oz', 'water'], 'saffron': ['saffron', '1/2 tsp', 'saffron'], 'rice-arborio': ['arborio rice', '1, 8 lb', 'rice-arborio']}
fields.directions: Bring the stock to a simmer. Soak the saffron threads in the hot water. Heat 3 ounces (90 grams) butter in a large, heavy saucepan. Add the onions and saut until translucent. Add the rice to the onions and butter. Stir well to coat the grains with butter, but do not allow the rice to brown. Add the wine and stir until it is completely absorbed. Add the saffron and soaking liquid. Add the simmering stock, 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) at a time, stirring frequently. Wait until the stock is absorbed before adding the next 4-fluid-ounce (120-milliliter) portion. After approximately 18 to 20 minutes, all the stock should be incorporated and the rice should be tender. Remove from the heat and stir in the remaining 1 ounce (30 grams) butter and the grated cheese. Serve immediately. VARIATIONS: Risotto with Radicchio (al Radicchio)Omit the saffron and Parmesan. Just before the risotto is fully cooked, stir in 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) heavy cream and 3 ounces (90 grams) finely chopped radicchio leaves. Risotto with Four Cheeses (al Quattro Formaggi)Omit the saffron. When the risotto is fully cooked, remove from the heat and stir in 2 ounces (60 grams) each grated Parmesan, Gorgonzola, Fontina and mozzarella. Garnish with toasted pine nuts and chopped parsley. Risotto with Smoked Salmon (al Salmone Affumicato)Omit the butter, saffron and Parmesan. Saut the onions in 3 fluid ounces (90 milliliters) corn or safflower oil instead of butter. When the risotto is fully cooked, remove from the heat and stir in 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) half-and-half, 3 fluid ounces (90 milliliters) fresh lemon juice and 810 ounces (240300 grams) good-quality smoked salmon. Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and dill. Serve with lemon wedges.

fields.name: Brown Beef Stew
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-chuck': ['beef chuck', '4, 8 lb', 'beef-chuck'], 'brown-stock': ['Brown Stock', '1 qt', 'brown-stock'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'tomato-pura-e': ['tomato purÃ©e', '4 oz', 'tomato-pura-e'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'wine-red': ['red wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-red'], 'onion': ['onion', '10 oz', 'onion'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '10 ea', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 1/2 oz', 'flour-all-purpose']}
fields.directions: Heat a heavy pot until very hot and add the oil. Season the beef with salt and pepper and add it to the pot, browning it well on all sides. Do not overcrowd the pot. If necessary, cook the beef in several batches. Add the onions and garlic and saut until the onions are slightly browned. Add the flour and stir to make a roux. Brown the roux lightly. Add the wine and stock slowly, stirring to prevent lumps. Add the tomato pure and the sachet. Bring to a simmer and cook until the beef is tender, approximately 112 to 2 hours. If desired, remove the cooked beef from the sauce and strain the sauce. Return the beef to the sauce. Degrease the stew by skimming off the fat. VARIATION: Vegetables such as turnips, carrots, celery and pearl onions can be cooked separately and added to the stew as garnish.

fields.name: Fresh Peach And Yogurt Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pistachio-nuts-shelled': ['shelled pistachio nutsas needed', '', 'pistachio-nuts-shelled'], 'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '24 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream to taste', '', 'cream-heavy'], 'yogurt-lowfat': ['lowfat yogurt', '8 oz', 'yogurt-lowfat'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1/4 tsp', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '2 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'honey': ['honey', '4 oz', 'honey'], 'peaches': ['peaches', '4 lb', 'peaches']}
fields.directions: Pit and coarsely chop the peaches without peeling. Place in a nonreactive saucepan. Add the wine, honey and lemon juice. Cover and simmer for 30 minutes. Pure the peach mixture in a blender. Strain and chill. Stir in the cinnamon, yogurt and cream. Chill thoroughly. Serve in chilled bowls, garnished with finely chopped pistachio nuts.

fields.name: Tulipe Cookies
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butteras needed', '', 'butter'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '1 lb', 'egg-whites'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugar', '1 lb', 'sugar-confectioners']}
fields.directions: Melt the unsalted butter and place in the bowl of a mixer fitted with the paddle attachment. Add the sugar and blend until almost smooth. Add the flour and blend until smooth. With the mixer running, add the egg whites very slow-ly. Beat until blended, but do not incorporate air into the batter. Strain the batter through a china cap and set aside to cool completely. Coat several sheet pans with melted butter or line with silicone mats. Spread the dough into 6-inch (15-centimeter) circles on the pans. Bake at 400F (200C) until the edges are brown and the dough is dry, approximately 12 to 18 minutes. To shape into cups, lift the hot cookies off the sheet pan one at a time with an offset spatula. Immediately place over an inverted glass and top with a ramekin or small bowl. The cookies cool very quickly, becoming firm and crisp. The cookie cups can be used for serving ice cream, crme brle, fruit or other items.

fields.name: Callaloo with Crab
fields.ingredient_amount: {'callaloo': ['callaloo', '1 lb', 'callaloo'], 'crabmeat-lump': ['lump crabmeat', '1 lb', 'crabmeat-lump'], 'onion': ['onion', '1 lb', 'onion'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '6 oz', 'onion-green'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '2 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'coconut-milk': ['coconut milk', '1 qt', 'coconut-milk'], 'milk': ['milk', '1 pt', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'pumpkin-fresh': ['fresh pumpkin', '1 lb', 'pumpkin-fresh']}
fields.directions: Wash the callaloo or spinach. Remove the stems and tough ribs and chop coarsely. Heat the oil in a rondeau and sweat the diced onions. Add the green onions and garlic and sweat for 2 more minutes. Add the callaloo or spinach, coconut milk, milk, pumpkin, salt and pepper. Bring the soup to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Cook for 30 minutes. Pure half of the soup in a blender, food processor or food mill. Return it to the pot with the remaining soup. Pick over the crab meat to remove any bits of shell and add the meat to the soup. Adjust the seasonings and serve.

fields.name: Brioche Loaf
fields.ingredient_amount: {'brioche-dough': ['Brioche Dough', '11, 6 lb', 'brioche-dough']}
fields.directions: Portion and shape the chilled dough as desired. Place the shaped dough in well-greased pans and proof at room temperature until doubled. Bake at 375F (190C) until the brioche is a dark golden brown and sounds hollow. Baking time will vary depending on the temperature of the dough and the size of the rolls or loaves being baked.

fields.name: Honey Cardamom Butter
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'honey': ['honey', '2 fl oz', 'honey'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 lb', 'butter'], 'salt-kosher': ['kosher salt', '1 tsp', 'salt-kosher'], 'cardamom-seed-ground': ['ground cardamom seed', '2 tbl', 'cardamom-seed-ground']}
fields.directions: 1 In a saut pan, heat the butter until it begins to brown. Add the cardamom, salt and pepper. Remove from the heat and add the honey. 2 Cool the mixture at room temperature until it begins to solidify. Transfer to the bowl of a small mixer and whip until it emulsifies. Transfer to a piece of parchment paper or plastic and form into a log. Refrigerate until ready to use.

fields.name: Aurora Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butter', '1 oz', 'butter'], 'allemande-sauce': ['Allemande Sauce', '1 qt', 'allemande-sauce'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '2 oz', 'tomato-paste'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Add to allemande 2 ounces (60 grams) tomato paste and finish with 1 ounce (30 grams) butter. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Garlic Yogurt Dressing
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yogurt-soy': ['soy yogurt', '1 pt', 'yogurt-soy'], 'mustard-dijon': ['Dijon mustard', '2 tbl', 'mustard-dijon'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'tabasco-sauce': ['tabasco sauce to taste', '', 'tabasco-sauce'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 tbl', 'garlic']}
fields.directions: Combine all the ingredients and chill until ready to use.

fields.name: Thai Noodle Salad
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-crushed-red': ['crushed red pepper', '1 pinch', 'pepper-crushed-red'], 'oil-sesame': ['sesame oil', '1 tbl', 'oil-sesame'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1/2 tbl', 'garlic'], 'oyster-sauce': ['oyster sauce', '2 tbl', 'oyster-sauce'], 'soy-sauce': ['soy sauce', '2 tbl', 'soy-sauce'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '2 bunch', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'noodles-cellophane': ['cellophane noodles', '3 1/2 oz', 'noodles-cellophane']}
fields.directions: 1 Pour boiling water over the noodles and allow them to steep until they are al dente, approxi-mately 5 minutes. Refresh in cold water. Drain well. 2 Toss the noodles with the other ingredients. Adjust the seasonings  to taste.

fields.name: Raspberry Vinaigrette
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-rice': ['rice vinegar', '8 fl oz', 'vinegar-rice'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '12 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'raspberry-preserves-seedless': ['seedless raspberry preserves', '8 oz', 'raspberry-preserves-seedless'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 1/2 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'honey': ['honey', '4 oz', 'honey'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1 tbl', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'vinegar-red-wine': ['red wine vinegar', '8 fl oz', 'vinegar-red-wine'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tbl', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '1 pt', 'oil-vegetable']}
fields.directions: Whisk together the vinegars, lemon juice, thyme, salt, pepper and garlic. Whisk in the honey and raspberry preserves. Slowly whisk in the oils, emulsifying the dressing.

fields.name: Pepper Steak
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '4 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '3 tbl', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'cognac': ['cognac', '2 fl oz', 'cognac'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'boneless-strip-steaks-8-oz': ['Boneless Strip Steaks (8 oz)', '2 ea', 'boneless-strip-steaks-8-oz'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '1 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Season the steaks with salt. Spread the peppercorns in a hotel pan and press the steaks into them, lightly coating each side. Saut the steaks in the clarified butter over high heat for 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Remove the pan from the heat. Pour the cognac over the steaks, return the pan to the heat and flamb. When the flames subside, remove the steaks from the pan and keep them warm on a plate. Add the cream to the pan. Bring to a boil and reduce for 2 minutes over high heat; mont au beurre. Pour this sauce over the steaks and serve immediately.

fields.name: Salmon Tranche (4 oz)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'salmon-fillet-3-4-lb': ['salmon fillet 3/4 lb', '1 ea', 'salmon-fillet-3-4-lb']}
fields.directions: Working on a seafood designated cutting board - remove skin, pin bones, and any excess white flap. Using accurate portion scale - cut into 4 oz tranches. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Lamb Jus Li
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['wateras needed', '', 'water'], 'cornstarch': ['cornstarchas needed', '', 'cornstarch'], 'lamb-stock': ['Lamb Stock', '1 qt', 'lamb-stock']}
fields.directions: Jus Li  Jus li (zhoo lee-ay), also known as fond li, is used like a demi-glace, especially to pro-duce small sauces. Jus li is lighter and easier to make than a demi-glace, however. It is made in one of two ways: A rich lamb stock is thickened with cornstarch or arrowroot and seasoned. A rich brown stock is simmered and reduced so that it thickens naturally because of the con-centrated amounts of gelatin and other proteins.

fields.name: Scotch Eggs
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sage-fresh': ['fresh sage', '1/2 tsp', 'sage-fresh'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-fresh'], 'bread-crumbs-dried': ['dried bread crumbsas needed', '', 'bread-crumbs-dried'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'worcestershire-sauce': ['worcestershire sauce', '1/2 tsp', 'worcestershire-sauce'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flouras needed', '', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '1 ea', 'eggs'], 'sausage-breakfast': ['breakfast sausage', '8 oz', 'sausage-breakfast']}
fields.directions: Combine the breakfast sausage, herbs, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper in a small bowl. With lightly floured hands, divide the sausage mixture into four equal portions. Flatten each portion into a thin patty. Dust the eggs with flour and wrap each egg in a portion of the sau-sage meat. Be sure the meat is of even thickness and there are no cracks. Bread the sausage-covered eggs using the standard breading procedure described in Chapter 8, Mise en Place. Deep-fry the eggs approximately 7 to 8 minutes at 350F (180C) or until the sausage meat is fully cooked. The eggs may be finished in the oven if they begin to get too dark in the fryer. Serve the eggs halved or quartered lengthwise, hot or cold, with Dijon mustard.

fields.name: Flourless Chocolate Spongecake
fields.ingredient_amount: {'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '4 1/2 oz', 'egg-yolks'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '6 1/2 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'cocoa-powder': ['cocoa powder', '2 oz', 'cocoa-powder'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '6 oz', 'egg-whites'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: 1 Using a mixer fitted with a whip, beat the egg whites to soft peaks. Add the sugar and continue whipping to stiff peaks. 2 In a separate bowl, whip the egg yolks to a thick ribbon. 3 When both mixtures have reached the proper consistency, add one-third of the whipped yolks to the egg whites, folding them together using a balloon whisk. Heavy streaks may remain in the batter. 4 Add the remaining egg yolks and gently fold together. Some streaks may remain in the bat-ter. 5 Add the vanilla extract and cocoa powder and gently fold together until no streaks remain in the batter. 6 Using a piping bag fitted with a large plain tip, pipe the batter onto parchment-lined sheet pans in a tight spiral pattern in order to form three 7-inch- (17centimeter-) diameter rounds. 7 Bake at 360F (180C) until the cake springs back when gently touched, approximately 25 minutes. Cool completely. Any unneeded cake rounds can be wrapped tightly in plastic wrap and frozen for later use.

fields.name: French Onion Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-stock': ['Beef Stock', '4 qt', 'beef-stock'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '4 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'onion-yellow': ['yellow onion', '10 lb', 'onion-yellow'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1/2 oz', 'thyme-fresh'], 'sherry-dry': ['dry sherry', '8 fl oz', 'sherry-dry'], 'cheese-gruyere': ['gruyere cheeseas needed', '', 'cheese-gruyere'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '8 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'bread-french': ['French breadas needed', '', 'bread-french'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Saut the onions in the butter over low heat. Carefully caramelize them thoroughly without burning. Deglaze the pan with 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) beef stock. Cook au sec. Repeat this process until the onions are a very dark, even brown. Add the remaining beef stock and the chicken stock and thyme. Bring to a simmer and cook 20 minutes to develop flavor. Adjust the seasonings and add the sherry. Serve in warm bowls. Top each portion with a slice of toasted French bread and a thick layer of cheese. Place under the broiler or salamander until the cheese is melted and lightly browned.

fields.name: Cream Beurre Blanc
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '8 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '6 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 tbl', 'shallot'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '8 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '2 tsp', 'clarified-butter'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Saut the shallot in the clarified butter until translucent but not brown. Add the wine and re-duce by half. Add the cream, bring to a boil and reduce by two-thirds. Remove from the heat and keep warm. Whisk the butter into the sauce in several batches. Move the pan back and forth over the heat to keep the sauce from becoming too hot or too cold. Season the sauce with salt and white pepper. Strain if desired. Hold in a warm place for ser-vice

fields.name: Mulligatawny Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '2 tbl', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '1 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'milk': ['milk', '4 fl oz', 'milk'], 'curry-powder': ['curry powder', '2 tsp', 'curry-powder'], 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless': ['boneless skinless chicken breast', '3 1/2 oz', 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless'], 'apple-granny-smith': ['granny smith apple', '1 oz', 'apple-granny-smith'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '12 oz', 'mirepoix'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'chives-fresh': ['fresh chivesas needed', '', 'chives-fresh'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: In a saucepot, heat the butter over medium heat; add the mirepoix and saut for 5 minutes. Add the flour and curry powder and cook to form a blond roux. Add the stock. Bring to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes. Add the chicken, apple and mushroom and cook for 15 more minutes. Finish with the milk and season with salt and white pepper. Garnish with fresh chives.

fields.name: Albufera Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'glace-de-volaille': ['Glace de Volaille', '3 fl oz', 'glace-de-volaille'], 'supra-me-sauce': ['SuprÃªme Sauce', '1 qt', 'supra-me-sauce'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'red-pepper-butter': ['Red Pepper Butter', '2 oz', 'red-pepper-butter']}
fields.directions: Add to suprme sauce 3 fluid ounces (90 milliliters) glace de volaille and 2 ounces ( 60 grams) red pepper butter (page 212). Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Balsamic Honey Glaze
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-balsamic': ['balsamic vinegar', '1 qt', 'vinegar-balsamic'], 'honey': ['honey', '1 lb', 'honey'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine all ingredients in a small saucepot. Simmer and reduce until it reachs a syruplike consistency.

fields.name: Veal Stew Meat
fields.ingredient_amount: {'veal-shoulder-boneless': ['boneless veal shoulder', '1 ea', 'veal-shoulder-boneless']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim veal shoulder (chuck) of all sliverskin. Cut into cubes of desired size, ensuring that they are of uniform size Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Cinnamon French Toast
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '4 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'bread-sourdough': ['sourdough bread', '12 slice', 'bread-sourdough'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon to taste', '', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugaras needed', '', 'sugar-confectioners'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butteras needed', '', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '10 ea', 'eggs']}
fields.directions: Whisk together the eggs, cream, salt and cinnamon. Place the egg mixture in a shallow pan. Place the slices of bread in the egg mixture and let soak for 2 to 3 minutes, turning them over after the first minute or so. Cook the slices of French toast in a lightly buttered, preheated saut pan or griddle set at 350F (180C) until well browned. Turn the slices and cook on the second side until done. Cut each slice of bread into two triangles. Arrange four triangles on each plate and dust with powdered sugar.

fields.name: Tournedos
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-tenderloin': ['beef tenderloin', '1 ea', 'beef-tenderloin']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat designated cutting board - trim tenderloin of the chain, excess fat and the sliverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut into tournedos of desired size. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Brennan's Red-Wine and Mushroom Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '4 oz', 'onion'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '1 pt', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '1 1/2 tbl', 'paprika'], 'beef-stock': ['Beef Stock', '24 fl oz', 'beef-stock'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'wine-burgundy': ['Burgundy wine', '6 fl oz', 'wine-burgundy'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '8 oz', 'onion-green'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '4 oz', 'tomato-paste'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '4 oz', 'butter'], 'worcestershire-sauce': ['worcestershire sauce', '1 tbl', 'worcestershire-sauce'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 oz', 'flour-all-purpose']}
fields.directions: 1 Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Add the onion and saut until tender, approximately 3 minutes. 2 Stir in the tomato paste, mushrooms and paprika. Cook until the mushroom is tender, then add the flour. Stir until well blended. 3 Using a whisk, incorporate the stock. When the sauce is smooth, add the green onions, Worcestershire sauce, wine and garlic. Simmer until reduced and thickened, approximately 25 minutes. Season  to taste with salt and pepper and hold for service

fields.name: Spiced Pecans
fields.ingredient_amount: {'tabasco-sauce': ['tabasco sauce', '2 drop', 'tabasco-sauce'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1/8 tsp', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 tsp', 'butter'], 'worcestershire-sauce': ['worcestershire sauce', '1 tbl', 'worcestershire-sauce'], 'pecan-halves': ['pecan halves', '6 oz', 'pecan-halves'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/8 tsp', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Combine the butter, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, salt, Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce. Add the pecan halves and blend well. Spread the nuts onto a sheet pan and bake at 300F (150C) for 10 minutes. Toss with a spat-ula and bake for an additional 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool.

fields.name: Potato and Celeriac Pure
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '8 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'potato-idaho': ['Idaho potato', '1, 8 lb', 'potato-idaho'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 tbl', 'butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'celeriac': ['celeriac', '8 oz', 'celeriac']}
fields.directions: Combine the potatoes and celeriac in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat, and simmer until tender, approximately 30 minutes. 2 Strain. Mash the potatoes and celeriac using a food mill or potato ricer. 3 Heat the cream and butter just to a boil. Add to the hot potato mixture. Using an electric mix-er fitted with a whip attachment, whip the pure until fluffy. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Tomato Chile Hollandaise
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chili-powder': ['chili powder', '1 tbl', 'chili-powder'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '1 tbl', 'tomato-paste'], 'hollandaise': ['Hollandaise', '1 qt', 'hollandaise']}
fields.directions: 1 Stir the chilli powder and tomato paste into the Hollandaise.

fields.name: Herb Butter
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1/4 cup', 'parsley-fresh'], 'dill-fresh': ['fresh dill', '1/4 cup', 'dill-fresh'], 'chives-fresh': ['fresh chives', '1/4 cup', 'chives-fresh'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'tarragon-fresh': ['fresh tarragon', '1/4 cup', 'tarragon-fresh']}
fields.directions: Add to the butter up to 1 cup (240 milliliters) mixed chopped fresh herbs such as parsley, dill, chives, tarragon or chervil.

fields.name: Chicken Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '8 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'chicken-backs-and-necks': ['chicken backs and necks', '15 lb', 'chicken-backs-and-necks']}
fields.directions: Cut the washed bones into pieces approximately 34 inches (810 centimeters) long. Place the bones in a stockpot and cover them with cold water. If blanching, bring the water to a boil, skimming off the scum that rises to the surface. Drain off the water and the impurities. Then add the 3 gallons (11.5 liters) cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. If not blanching the bones, bring the cold water to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and skim the scum that forms. Add the mirepoix and sachet to the simmering stock. Continue simmering and skimming the stock for 6 to 8 hours. (If only chicken bones are used, simmer for 3 to 4 hours.) Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Basic Fudge Frosting
fields.ingredient_amount: {'corn-syrup-light': ['light corn syrup', '3 oz', 'corn-syrup-light'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugar', '2 lb', 'sugar-confectioners'], 'water': ['water', '4 fl oz', 'water'], 'shortening-vegetable': ['vegetable shortening', '2 oz', 'shortening-vegetable'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '3 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/8 tsp', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: Place the powdered sugar in the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whisk attachment. Bring the butter, shortening, corn syrup, water and salt to a boil in a saucepan over medium high heat. Remove the pan from heat. With the machine running, pour the hot mixture over the powdered sugar. Whip until the mixture is smooth and fluffy. Stir in the vanilla. The icing can be used immediately. VARIATION: Cocoa Fudge FrostingSift 3 ounces (90 grams) cocoa powder with the powdered sugar. Add 2 ounces (60 grams) melted unsalted butter with the shortening.

fields.name: Entrectes Bordelaise
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-marrow': ['beef marrow', '4 oz', 'beef-marrow'], 'entreca-tes-14-oz': ['EntrecÃ´tes (14 oz)', '2 ea', 'entreca-tes-14-oz'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '12 fl oz', 'demi-glace'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 tbl', 'shallot'], 'wine-red': ['red wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-red'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 oz', 'butter'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '2 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Slice the marrow into rounds and poach in salted water for 3 minutes. Drain the marrow and set it aside. Season the steaks and saut them in the clarified butter to the desired doneness. Finish in the oven if desired. Remove to a platter and hold in a warm place. Saut the shallots in the same pan. Deglaze the pan with the wine and reduce by half. Add the demi-glace; simmer for 5 minutes. Mont au beurre. Add the marrow to the sauce. Adjust the seasonings. Divide each steak into two portions and serve the steaks with the sauce.

fields.name: Horseradish Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '4 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'allemande-sauce': ['Allemande Sauce', '1 qt', 'allemande-sauce'], 'horseradish-fresh': ['fresh horseradish', '2 oz', 'horseradish-fresh'], 'mustard-dry': ['dry mustard', '1 tsp', 'mustard-dry'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Add to allemande 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) heavy cream and 1 teaspoon (5 milliliters) dry mustard. Just before service add 2 ounces (60 grams) freshly grated horseradish. The horseradish should not be cooked with the sauce. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Roast Prime Rib of Beef Au Jus
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '1 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'brown-stock': ['Brown Stock', '2 qt', 'brown-stock'], 'beef-rib-roast-oven-ready': ['oven ready beef rib roast', '16 lb', 'beef-rib-roast-oven-ready'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '4 oz', 'garlic'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Pull back the netting, fold back the fat cap and season the roast well with the salt, pepper and garlic. Replace the fat cap and netting; place the roast in an appropriate-sized roasting pan. Roast at 300F325F (150C160C). Add the mirepoix to the pan approximately 45 minutes before the roast is finished cooking. Continue cooking until the internal temperature reaches 125F (52C), approximately 3 to 4 hours. Carryover cooking will raise the internal temperature of the roast to approximately 138F (59C). Remove the roast from the pan and allow it to rest in a warm place for 30 minutes. Drain the excess fat from the roasting pan, reserving the mirepoix and any drippings in the roasting pan. Caramelize the mirepoix on the stove top; allow the liquids to evaporate, leaving only brown drippings in the pan. Deglaze the pan with the stock. Stir to loosen all the drippings. Simmer the jus, reducing it slightly and allowing the mirepoix to release its flavor; season with salt and pepper if necessary. Strain the jus through a china cap lined with cheesecloth. Skim any remaining fat from the surface with a ladle. Remove the netting from the roast. Trim and slice the roast as described on page 284 and serve with approximately 1 to 2 ounces (30 to 60 milliliters) jus per person.

fields.name: Light Rye Bread
fields.ingredient_amount: {'egg-wash': ['Egg Washas needed', '', 'egg-wash'], 'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1/2 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'molasses': ['molasses', '3 oz', 'molasses'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt-kosher': ['kosher salt', '1 tbl', 'salt-kosher'], 'caraway-seed-whole': ['whole caraway seed', '2 tbl', 'caraway-seed-whole'], 'water': ['water', '14 fl oz', 'water'], 'flour-medium-rye': ['medium rye flour', '8 oz', 'flour-medium-rye'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 tbl', 'butter-unsalted'], 'milk-nonfat-dry': ['nonfat dry milk', '1 1/2 oz', 'milk-nonfat-dry']}
fields.directions: Stir the flours together and set aside. To make the sponge, combine the molasses, water and yeast. Add 8 ounces (240 grams) of the flour mixture. Stir vigorously for 3 minutes. Cover the bowl and set aside to rise until doubled and very bubbly, approximately 1 hour. Stir the milk powder, caraway seeds, salt and butter into the sponge. Transfer the dough to a mixer fitted with a dough hook. Gradually add the remaining flour to the sponge. Mix on low speed and continue adding flour until the dough is stiff but slightly tacky. Knead for 5 minutes on low speed. Transfer the dough to a lightly greased bowl, cover and place in a warm place until doubled, approximately 45 to 60 minutes. Punch down the dough and divide into two pieces. Shape each piece into a round loaf and place on a sheet pan that has been dusted with cornmeal or lightly oiled. Brush the loaves with egg wash and let rise until doubled, approximately 45 minutes. Score the tops with a razor or knife. Bake at 375F (190C) until golden brown and crusty, approximately 25 minutes.

fields.name: White Veal Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'veal-bones': ['veal bones', '15 lb', 'veal-bones'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '12 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black']}
fields.directions: Cut the washed bones into pieces approximately 34 inches (810 centimeters) long. Place the bones in a stockpot and cover them with cold water. If blanching, bring the water to a boil, skimming off the scum that rises to the surface. Drain off the water and the impurities. Then add the 3 gallons (11.5 liters) cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. If not blanching the bones, bring the cold water to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and skim the scum that forms. Add the mirepoix and sachet to the simmering stock. Continue simmering and skimming the stock for 6 to 8 hours. (If only chicken bones are used, simmer for 3 to 4 hours.) Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Dough for Pt
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '5 fl oz', 'water'], 'shortening-vegetable': ['vegetable shortening', '7 oz', 'shortening-vegetable'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '1 ea', 'eggs']}
fields.directions: Place the flour in the bowl of a mixer. Add the shortening and mix on low speed until smooth. Combine the salt, water and egg; add them to the flour and shortening mixture. Knead until smooth and refrigerate. The dough will be easier to work with if allowed to rest for at least 1 hour. Assembling, Baking and Glazing Pt  After preparing a forcemeat and pastry dough, all that remains is to assemble and bake the pt en crote. The amount of pastry dough and forcemeat needed is determined by the size of the mold or pan chosen. Once the pt is baked and cooled, aspic jelly is poured into holes in the dough to fill the space created when the pt shrank during cooking. Slices of pt can also be glazed with aspic for a more formal presentation.

fields.name: Smoked Bacon and Black Quinoa Pilaf
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'quinoa': ['quinoa', '3 cup', 'quinoa'], 'onion': ['onion', '6 oz', 'onion'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '1 oz', 'onion-green'], 'bacon': ['bacon', '10 slice', 'bacon'], 'rice-basmati': ['basmati rice', '3 cup', 'rice-basmati'], 'water': ['water', '5 pt', 'water'], 'pepper-red-bell': ['red bell pepper', '8 oz', 'pepper-red-bell'], 'peas-green': ['green peas', '8 oz', 'peas-green'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '8 oz', 'carrot']}
fields.directions: 1 Dice the bacon and cook in a medium saucepan until crisp. Remove the bacon and reserve. 2 Add the onion, carrot and bell peppers to the bacon grease and saut for 2 minutes. Add the rice and quinoa and saut until the rice becomes translucent and is completely coated with the bacon grease.

fields.name: Shortbread Tart Dough
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-pastry': ['pastry flour', '1, 10 lb', 'flour-pastry'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugar', '11 oz', 'sugar-confectioners'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '5 oz', 'egg-yolks'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1, 8 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'almond-flour': ['almond flour', '4 1/2 oz', 'almond-flour'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tbl', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: Press the egg yolks through a sieve using a plastic pastry scraper. Set aside. Using a mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, cream the butter. Add the sugar, combining well. Add the vanilla extract, salt and almond or hazelnut flour, then the sieved egg yolks, and mix until combined. Add all of the pastry flour and mix on low speed just until combined. Do not overmix. Wrap the dough in plastic and chill for several hours or overnight. When ready to use, roll out the chilled dough on a lightly floured board. The dough may be crumbly and difficult to work with, which is normal. Simply press the dough back together with your fingertips.

fields.name: Curried Chickpea Crisps
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-cayenne'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1 tsp', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin', '1 tbl', 'cumin-ground'], 'turmeric': ['turmeric', '1 tbl', 'turmeric'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tbl', 'salt'], 'oil-extra-virgin-olive': ['extra virgin olive oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-extra-virgin-olive'], 'water': ['water', '6 fl oz', 'water'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'coriander-ground': ['ground coriander', '1 tbl', 'coriander-ground'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '6 1/2 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'flour-chickpea': ['chickpea flour', '5 oz', 'flour-chickpea'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: 1 In a stainless steel bowl, stir together the dry ingredients. Form a pool in the middle of the mixture and add the liquid ingredients. Mix together by hand, adding additional flour if nec-essary. Knead until smooth and elastic, approximately 5 minutes. 2 Roll out the dough using a pasta machine to thickness number 6. Using a ravioli cutter, cut the dough into   (5-centimeter  6-millimeter) strips. 3 Using the swimming method, deep-fry the strips at 275F (135C) for 3 minutes. Season with salt and hold warm.

fields.name: Cardinal Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '16 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'fish-stock': ['Fish Stock', '8 fl oz', 'fish-stock'], 'lobster-butter': ['Lobster Butter', '1 1/2 oz', 'lobster-butter'], 'fish-velouta': ['Fish VeloutÃ©', '1 qt', 'fish-velouta'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1 pinch', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Add 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) fish stock to 1 quart (1 liter) fish velout. Reduce this mixture by half and add 16 fluid ounces (480 milliliters) heavy cream and a dash of cayenne pepper. Bring to a boil and swirl in 112 ounces (45 grams) lobster butter (page 212). Garnish with chopped lobster coral at service time. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Cooked Long-Grain Rice
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '1 pt', 'water'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'rice-long-grain': ['long grain rice', '8 oz', 'rice-long-grain']}
fields.directions: Bring the water and salt to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Slowly add the rice. Cover the pan and reduce the heat so that the liquid simmers gently. Cook until the rice is tender and the water is absorbed, approximately 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from the heat and transfer to a hotel pan. Do not cover. Allow any excess moisture to evaporate for approximately 5 minutes. Fluff the rice and serve, or refrigerate for use in another recipe.

fields.name: Shallot Butter
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '8 oz', 'shallot'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Blanch 8 ounces (240 grams) peeled shallots in boiling water. Dry and finely dice them and mix with the butter.

fields.name: Lamb Noisettes (3 oz)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lamb-loin-boneless': ['boneless lamb loin', '1 ea', 'lamb-loin-boneless']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim lamb of all excess fat and sliverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut ribeye into 3 oz. noisettes. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Buttermilk Pancakes
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '1 tbl', 'baking-powder'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '3 ea', 'eggs'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '1 1/2 pt', 'buttermilk'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butteras needed', '', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 tbl', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Sift the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together. Combine the buttermilk, melted butter and eggs and add them to the dry ingredients. Mix just until the ingredients are combined. If the griddle is not well seasoned, coat it lightly with clarified butter. Once its temperature reaches 375F (190C), drop the batter onto it in 2-fluid-ounce (60-milliliter) portions using a ladle, portion scoop or batter portioner. When bubbles appear on the pancakes surface and the bottom is browned, flip the pancake to finish cooking. VARIATIONS: Blueberry PancakesGently stir 1 pint (480 milliliters) fresh or frozen blueberries into the batter. If using frozen berries, drain them thoroughly, then pat dry with paper towels before adding them to the batter. Serve with blueberry syrup or compote.

fields.name: Tomatillo Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'tomatillos': ['tomatillos', '8 ea', 'tomatillos'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin', '1 tsp', 'cumin-ground'], 'lime': ['lime', '1 ea', 'lime'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1/2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'honey': ['honey', '1/2 fl oz', 'honey'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '3 oz', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'pepper-jalapeno-chile': ['jalapeno chile pepper', '2 ea', 'pepper-jalapeno-chile']}
fields.directions: 1 Remove the husks from the tomatillos. Soak them in warm water for 30 seconds. Drain the tomatillos and toss in the oil. Place the tomatillos on a half-sheet pan and roast in a 300F (150C) oven until soft but not colored. Cool completely. 2 Juice the lime. 3 Combine the lime juice and the tomatillos with the remaining ingredients in the bowl of a blender and blend for a few seconds or until smooth.

fields.name: Roasted Garlic Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 pt', 'demi-glace'], 'wine-madeira': ['Madeira wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-madeira'], 'roux': ['Rouxas needed', '', 'roux'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic-head': ['garlic head', '1 ea', 'garlic-head'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 sprig', 'thyme-fresh'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '4 tbl', 'shallot'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '1 tbl', 'clarified-butter']}
fields.directions: Saut the shallot lightly in the clarified butter until slightly caramelized. Add the wine, thyme and bay leaf and reduce by one-third. Squeeze in the garlic, discarding the skins and root. Add the demi-glace and reduce by one-third. Thicken slightly with roux if desired, adjust the seasonings and force through a fine strainer.

fields.name: Fresh Tomato Vinaigrette for Pasta
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-balsamic': ['balsamic vinegar', '3 fl oz', 'vinegar-balsamic'], 'tomato-concassa': ['Tomato ConcassÃ©', '8 oz', 'tomato-concassa'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 tbl', 'shallot'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '6 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'basil-fresh': ['fresh basil', '1 oz', 'basil-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Dissolve the salt in the vinegar in a small stainless steel bowl. Whisk in the olive oil. Then stir in the tomato, fresh herbs and shallot. Season with pepper. Use this vinaigrette to season up to 2 pounds (approximately 1 kilogram) of any type of cooked pasta, adjusting the seasonings before serving warm or chilled as an accompaniment to sandwiches or other foods.

fields.name: Caramel Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '1 pt', 'water'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 qt', 'cream-heavy'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '5 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '2 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '4, 8 lb', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine the sugar and water in a large heavy saucepan. Stir to moisten the sugar completely. Place the saucepan on the stove top over high heat and bring to a boil. Brush down the sides of the pan with water to remove any sugar granules. When the sugar comes to a boil, add the lemon juice. Do not stir the sugar, as this may cause lumping. Continue boiling until the sugar caramelizes, approximately 338F (170C), turning a dark golden brown and producing a rich aroma. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Gradually add the cream. Be extremely careful, as the hot caramel may splatter. Whisk in the cream to blend. Add the pieces of butter. Stir until the butter melts completely. If necessary, return the sauce to the stove to reheat enough to melt the butter. Strain the sauce and cool completely at room temperature. The sauce may be stored for sever-al weeks under refrigeration. Stir before using.

fields.name: Mint and Celeriac Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 pt', 'demi-glace'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '4 oz', 'shallot'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '2 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'mint-fresh': ['fresh mint', '1/2 oz', 'mint-fresh'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 oz', 'butter'], 'vinegar-red-wine': ['red wine vinegar', '2 fl oz', 'vinegar-red-wine'], 'wine-port': ['port wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-port'], 'celeriac': ['celeriac', '4 oz', 'celeriac']}
fields.directions: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the shallots, garlic and celeriac and saut until tender, but not brown. 2 Add the vinegar and reduce au sec. 3 Add the wine and mint and reduce by half. 4 Add the demi-glace and simmer for 30 minutes. Strain and keep warm for service. The sauce can be made up to one day in advance and refrigerated, then reheated as needed.

fields.name: Crpes
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '14 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '6 ea', 'eggs'], 'water': ['water', '12 fl oz', 'water'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '6 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '5 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'milk': ['milk', '18 fl oz', 'milk'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butteras needed', '', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
