fields.directions: Whisk together the eggs, egg yolks, water and milk. Add the sugar, salt and flour; whisk to-gether. Stir in the melted butter. Cover and set aside to rest for at least 1 hour before cooking. Heat a small saut or crpe pan; brush lightly with clarified butter. Pour in 1 to 1 1/2 fluid ounces (30 to 45 milliliters) of batter; swirl to coat the bottom of the pan evenly. Cook the crpe until set and light brown, approximately 30 seconds. Flip it over and cook a few seconds longer. Remove from the pan. Repeat this process until all the batter is used. Cooked crpes may be used immediately or covered and held briefly in a warm oven. Crpes can also be wrapped well in plastic wrap and refrigerated for 2 to 3 days or frozen for several weeks. VARIATIONS: Savory CrpesReduce the sugar to 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters). Substitute up to 5 ounces (150 grams) buckwheat flour or whole-wheat flour for an equal amount of the all-purpose flour if de-sired. Savory Crpes FlorentineFill Savory Crpes with creamed spinach topped with Mornay sauce.

fields.name: Brown Veal Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '8 oz', 'tomato-paste'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '12 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'veal-bones': ['veal bones', '15 lb', 'veal-bones'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '3 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black']}
fields.directions: Place the bones in a roasting pan, one layer deep, and brown in a 375F (190C) oven. Turn the bones occasionally to brown them evenly. Remove the bones and place them in a stockpot. Pour off the fat from the roasting pan and reserve it. Deglaze the roasting pan with part of the cold water. Add the deglazing liquor and the rest of the cold water to the bones, covering them completely. Bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Add a portion of the reserved fat to the roasting pan and saut the mirepoix until evenly browned. Then add it to the simmering stock. Add the tomato paste and sachet to the stock and continue to simmer for 6 to 8 hours, skim-ming as necessary. Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Gingered Dal
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cumin-whole': ['whole cumin', '1 tbl', 'cumin-whole'], 'butter': ['butter', '6 oz', 'butter'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '1 ea', 'ginger-fresh'], 'onion': ['onion', '1 ea', 'onion'], 'water': ['water', '1 qt', 'water'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '2 tbl', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'lentils-yellow': ['yellow lentils', '12 oz', 'lentils-yellow'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'mustard-seed-black': ['black mustard seed', '2 tbl', 'mustard-seed-black'], 'potato-yukon-gold': ['Yukon gold potato', '2 ea', 'potato-yukon-gold']}
fields.directions: 1 Bring the lentils, water, potatoes, ginger and salt to a boil. Cover and simmer until the lentils are tender and the water is absorbed, approximately 1 hour. 2 In a large saut pan, melt the butter and add the onion and the cumin and mustard seeds. Cook until the butter is slightly brown. Transfer to a large mixing bowl. Add the lentil mix-ture and mash with a wooden spoon. Season with salt and pepper and add the lemon juice. Hold warm for service.

fields.name: Beurre Blanc
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-white-wine': ['white wine vinegar', '1 fl oz', 'vinegar-white-wine'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 oz', 'shallot'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 lb', 'butter'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Combine the white wine, white wine vinegar, salt, white pepper and shallot in a small sauce-pan. Reduce the mixture until approximately 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) of liquid remain. If more than 2 tablespoons of liquid are allowed to remain, the resulting sauce will be too thin. For a thicker sauce, reduce the mixture au sec. Cut the butter into pieces approximately 1 ounce (30 grams) in weight. Over low heat, whisk in the butter a few pieces at a time, using the chilled butter to keep the sauce between 100F and 120F (38C and 49C). Once all the butter has been incorporated, remove the saucepan from the heat. Strain through a chinois and hold the sauce at a temperature between 100F and 130F (38C and 54C) for service. VARIATIONS: Beurre RougeSubstitute a dry red wine for the white wine and red wine vinegar for the white wine vinegar. Lemon-DillHeat 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) lemon juice and whisk it into the beurre blanc. Stir in 4 tablespoons (60 milliliters) chopped fresh dill. Pink PeppercornAdd 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) coarsely crushed pink peppercorns to the shallot-wine reduction when making beurre rouge. Garnish the finished sauce with whole pink peppercorns.

fields.name: Waffles
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '18 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '2 tbl', 'baking-powder'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '2 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '4 ea', 'eggs'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '5 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'milk': ['milk', '24 fl oz', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Mix the dry ingredients together in a large bowl. Whisk the eggs together in a separate bowl; add the milk, butter and vanilla extract,, stirring to combine. Pour the liquid mixture into the dry ingredients, stirring to blend. Keep refrigerated until ready to use. Batter may be made up to 1 day in advance. Cook in a preheated waffle iron according to the manufacturers directions. Serve waffles immediately with your choice of toppings. VARIATIONS: Pecan WafflesSprinkle 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) chopped pecans over the batter as soon as it is poured onto the waffle iron. Substitute 1 teaspoon (5 milliliters) pecan flavoring for the vanilla extract if desired.

fields.name: Venison Medallions
fields.ingredient_amount: {'venison-boneless-loin': ['boneless loin venison', '1 ea', 'venison-boneless-loin']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim venison of all sliverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut into medallions of desired size. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator

fields.name: Mango Ketchup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'allspice-ground': ['ground allspice', '1/2 tsp', 'allspice-ground'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '1 tbl', 'ginger-fresh'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1 pinch', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'salt-kosher': ['kosher salt', '1 tsp', 'salt-kosher'], 'mango': ['mango', '5 ea', 'mango'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '4 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'vinegar-wine': ['wine vinegar', '3 tbl', 'vinegar-wine'], 'cloves-whole': ['whole cloves', '1 ea', 'cloves-whole'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: 1 Peel and pit the mangoes. Pure the pulp in a food processor fitted with a stainless steel blade. 2 Add all the remaining ingredients and pulse together. 3 In a heavy-sided saucepan, cook the mixture over low heat for 1 hour, until well reduced and thickened. 4 Remove from the heat and cool. 5 Strain through a fine sieve. Let set refrigerated for 24 hours.

fields.name: Beurre Rouge
fields.ingredient_amount: {'shallot': ['shallot', '1 oz', 'shallot'], 'wine-red': ['red wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-red'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 lb', 'butter'], 'vinegar-red-wine': ['red wine vinegar', '1 fl oz', 'vinegar-red-wine'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Combine the red wine, red wine vinegar, salt, white pepper and shallot in a small sauce-pan. Reduce the mixture until approximately 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) of liquid remain. If more than 2 tablespoons of liquid are allowed to remain, the resulting sauce will be too thin. For a thicker sauce, reduce the mixture au sec. Cut the butter into pieces approximately 1 ounce (30 grams) in weight. Over low heat, whisk in the butter a few pieces at a time, using the chilled butter to keep the sauce between 100F and 120F (38C and 49C). Once all the butter has been incorporated, remove the saucepan from the heat. Strain through a chinois and hold the sauce at a temperature between 100F and 130F (38C and 54C) for service.

fields.name: Venison Medallions (3 oz)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'venison-boneless-loin': ['boneless loin venison', '1 ea', 'venison-boneless-loin']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim venison of all sliverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut into 3 oz medallions. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator

fields.name: Brioche Dough
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1 3/4 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '4, 7 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '24 ea', 'eggs'], 'water': ['water', '7 oz', 'water'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '3 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 3/4 oz', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '7 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Place the flour, eggs, salt and sugar into the bowl of a mixer fitted with a dough hook. Stir the ingredients together. Combine the yeast and water and add to the other ingredients. Knead approximately 20 minutes on medium speed. The dough will be smooth, shiny and moist. It should not form a ball. Slowly add the butter to the dough. Knead only until all the butter is incorporated. Remove the dough from the mixer and place it into a bowl dusted with flour. Cover and let the dough ferment at room temperature until doubled. Punch down the dough, cover tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight. Portion and shape the chilled dough as desired.

fields.name: Strawberry Crpes Fitzgerald
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '5 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'cra-pes': ['CrÃªpes', '16 ea', 'cra-pes'], 'strawberries': ['strawberries', '35 oz', 'strawberries'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tbl', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'butter': ['butter', '1/2 oz', 'butter'], 'maraschino-liqueur': ['maraschino liqueur', '1 fl oz', 'maraschino-liqueur'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tbl', 'vanilla-extract'], 'cream-sour': ['sour cream', '2 1/2 fl oz', 'cream-sour'], 'cheese-cream': ['cream cheese', '1 lb', 'cheese-cream']}
fields.directions: Combine the cream cheese, sour cream, vanilla extract and 1 ounce (30 grams) sugar in a mixing bowl and beat until smooth. Place 3 tablespoons (45 milliliters) of the filling on one end of each crpe; roll the crpes around the filling and then refrigerate them while preparing the topping. To make the topping, heat the butter and the remaining sugar in a large saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring until the sugar dissolves. Add the strawberries and lemon juice. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer until the liquid thickens, ap-proximately 10 to 12 minutes. Add the maraschino liqueur and flamb as described on page 341. To serve, place two crpes on each of eight plates and spoon approximately 6 fluid ounces (180 milliliters) of warm strawberry topping over the crpes.

fields.name: Veal Marsala
fields.ingredient_amount: {'brown-veal-stock': ['Brown Veal Stock', '4 fl oz', 'brown-veal-stock'], 'wine-dry-marsala': ['dry Marsala wine', '6 fl oz', 'wine-dry-marsala'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 1/2 oz', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flouras needed', '', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'veal-scallops-3-oz': ['Veal Scallops (3 oz)', '12 ea', 'veal-scallops-3-oz'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '2 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Season the scallops with salt and pepper. Dredge the scallops in flour and saut them in a mixture of the clarified butter and oil, a few at a time, until all are cooked. Remove the scallops and set aside. Degrease the pan and deglaze with the wine. Add the stock and reduce until it begins to thicken. Return the scallops to the sauce to reheat. Remove the scallops to plates or a serving platter. Reduce the sauce until it becomes syrupy; adjust the seasonings. Mont au beurre and spoon the sauce over the veal. Serve the veal with mashed potatoes and cooked baby carrots or other garnishes.

fields.name: Poached Eggs
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '1 qt', 'water'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'vinegar-white': ['white vinegar', '1 oz', 'vinegar-white'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs']}
fields.directions: Bring the water to a simmer; add the salt and vinegar. Crack one egg into a cup and carefully add it to the water. Repeat with the other egg. Cook the eggs to the desired doneness, approximately 3 to 5 minutes. Remove them from the water with a slotted spoon and serve as desired or carefully lower them into ice water and re-frigerate for later use.

fields.name: Cheese Blintzes
fields.ingredient_amount: {'salt': ['salt', '3/4 tsp', 'salt'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '3 ea', 'eggs'], 'cheese-ricotta': ['ricotta cheese', '12 oz', 'cheese-ricotta'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tsp', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '1 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '4 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'milk': ['milk', '8 fl oz', 'milk'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butteras needed', '', 'clarified-butter'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: To make the batter, whisk together the eggs, milk and oil. Add 1/2 teaspoon (2 milliliters) salt. Stir in the flour and mix until smooth. Allow the batter to rest for 30 minutes. Heat a crpe pan and add a small amount of clarified butter. Pour 1 fluid ounce (30 milliliters) of the batter into the pan. Tip the pan so that the batter coats the entire surface in a thin layer. Cook the pancake until browned on the bottom. Remove it from the pan. Repeat this procedure until all of the pancakes are made. To make the filling, drain the ricotta in a china cap, discarding the liquid. Place the drained cheese in a bowl with the remaining salt and the egg yolk, lemon juice and vanilla extract and mix well. To assemble, place a pancake on the work surface with the browned side up. Place 1 ounce (30 grams) of the filling in the center of the pancake. Fold the opposite ends in and then roll up to form a small package. Saut each blintz in butter until hot. Serve with sour cream or fruit compote as desired.

fields.name: Apple Fritters
fields.ingredient_amount: {'apple-golden-delicious': ['golden delicious apple', '1, 8 lb', 'apple-golden-delicious'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '0.4 oz', 'baking-powder'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '0.04 oz', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugaras needed', '', 'sugar-confectioners'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '4 oz', 'egg-yolks'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'milk': ['milk', '16 fl oz', 'milk'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '6 oz', 'egg-whites'], 'salt': ['salt', '0.2 oz', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine the egg yolks and milk.  Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon. Add the flour mixture to the milk-and-egg mixture; mix until smooth.  Allow the batter to rest 1 hour.  Stir the apples into the batter.  Just before the fritters are to be cooked, whip the egg whites to soft peaks and fold into the batter.  Scoop the fritters into deep fat at 350F (180C). Once browned on one side, flip the fritters in the fat to cook until done.  Dust with powdered sugar and serve hot.

fields.name: Chicken And Sausage Gumbo
fields.ingredient_amount: {'celery': ['celery', '2 1/2 lb', 'celery'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '1 tbl', 'paprika'], 'okra': ['okra', '1 lb', 'okra'], 'andouille': ['andouille', '2 lb', 'andouille'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '1 pt', 'onion-green'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 tbl', 'garlic'], 'salt': ['salt', '3 tbl', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '28 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless': ['boneless skinless chicken breast', '4 lb', 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless'], 'onion': ['onion', '2 1/2 lb', 'onion'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '4 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '4 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'pepper-green-bell': ['green bell pepper', '1 1/2 lb', 'pepper-green-bell'], 'fila-powder': ['filÃ© powder', '2 tbl', 'fila-powder'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '20 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'rice-long-grain': ['long grain rice', '3 cup', 'rice-long-grain'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Combine the cayenne pepper, paprika, white pepper and black pepper. Season the chicken with 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) salt and 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) of the pepper mix. Dust the chicken with some of the flour. Pan-fry the chicken in 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) oil until well browned. Remove the chicken from the pan and reserve. Strain the oil used to brown the chicken in order to remove burnt particles. Return the strained oil to the pan. Add 16 fluid ounces (480 milliliters) fresh vegetable oil. Over me-dium heat, add the remaining flour while stirring with a whisk to make a roux. Cook the roux very slowly over medium heat, stirring often, until it becomes a copper-brown color, ap-proximately 45 minutes to 1 hour. Add the onions, celery, bell peppers, garlic, fil powder, bay leaves and the remaining salt and pepper mix. Cook for 5 minutes. Add the stock and bring to a simmer. Skim the fat from the surface and cook for approximately 112 hours, skimming occasionally. When the strong roux flavor fades, add the reserved chicken and the andouille. Cook the gumbo for 1 more hour, skimming regularly. Saut the okra in the remaining 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) oil, drain and add to the gumbo. Adjust the seasonings with the salt, pepper, cayenne, fil powder, hot sauce or other seasonings as desired. Serve each portion of gumbo with 1 to 2 tablespoons (15 to 30 milliliters) cooked rice and garnish with sliced green onion tops.

fields.name: Sorrel Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 pt', 'cream-heavy'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 tbl', 'shallot'], 'sorrel': ['sorrel', '8 oz', 'sorrel'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 oz', 'butter'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'spinach-fresh': ['fresh spinach', '8 oz', 'spinach-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: 1 Saut the shallot in the butter until tender. 2 Add the wine and reduce by half. 3 Add the cream and reduce until it begins to thicken. 4 Add the sorrel and spinach to the cream and cook just until the leaves are wilted. 5 Pure the sauce in a blender or food processor and season with salt, white pepper and lemon juice. Serve the sauce with egg, chicken, veal or rich fish dishes. The tart sour flavor of this sauce compliments fatty fish such as salmon and artic char

fields.name: New York Cheesecake
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lemon-zest': ['Lemon Zest', '1 1/2 tsp', 'lemon-zest'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tbl', 'vanilla-extract'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '8 ea', 'eggs'], 'graham-crackers': ['graham crackers', '1 lb', 'graham-crackers'], 'butter': ['butter', '6 oz', 'butter'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '14 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '14 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'flour-cake': ['cake flour', '2 oz', 'flour-cake'], 'cheese-cream': ['cream cheese', '3, 6 lb', 'cheese-cream']}
fields.directions: Combine the graham cracker crumbs with the melted butter. Press the mixture into the bot-tom of two 8-inch (20-centimeter) round springform pans. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes at 375F (180C) until the crust is dry to the touch. Set aside. Blend the cream cheese and sugar on low speed in the bowl of a mixer fitted with the paddle attachment until no lumps remain. Scrape down the bowl often. Add the eggs one at a time, waiting for each egg to be fully incorporated before adding more. Scrape down the bowl and paddle between each addition. Add the flour and mix until combined. Add the remaining ingredients and mix to blend. Divide the cheesecake batter evenly between the two pans. Wrap the bottom and sides of each pan in several layers of aluminum foil. Preheat the oven to 300F (150C). Place the batter-filled pans in a hotel pan and set the hotel pan in the preheated oven. Pour in enough water to come halfway up the sides of the pans. Bake until the batter is set and no longer trembles, approximately 75 to 90 minutes. Cool the cakes on a wire rack in their pans, then refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cakes from the pan.

fields.name: Game Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'quail-trimmings': ['quail trimmings', '2, 8 lb', 'quail-trimmings'], 'quail-semi-boneless': ['semi-boneless quail', '5 lb', 'quail-semi-boneless'], 'pheasant-trimmings-from-production': ['pheasant trimmings [from production]', '2, 8 lb', 'pheasant-trimmings-from-production'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '8 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pheasant-whole': ['whole pheasant', '5 lb', 'pheasant-whole']}
fields.directions: Cut the pheasant into pieces. Take the breast meat off the frame and reserve for other use. Place pheasant, quail, and trimmings in a stockpot and cover with cold water. If blanching, bring the water to a boil, skimming off the scum that rises to the surface. Drain off the water and the impurities. Then add the 3 gallons (11.5 liters) cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. If not blanching the bones, bring the cold water to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and skim the scum that forms. Add the mirepoix and sachet to the simmering stock. Continue simmering and skimming the stock for 6 to 8 hours. (If only chicken bones are used, simmer for 3 to 4 hours.) Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Cheddar and Leek Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '8 oz', 'mirepoix'], 'croutons': ['Croutonsas needed', '', 'croutons'], 'leeks': ['leeks', '8 oz', 'leeks'], 'cheese-cheddar': ['cheddar cheese', '1 lb', 'cheese-cheddar'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 1/2 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsleyas needed', '', 'parsley-fresh'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/4 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '2 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'cream-half-half': ['half & half cream', '4 fl oz', 'cream-half-half'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Sweat the mirepoix and leeks in the butter until tender. Stir in the flour and cook to make a blond roux. Stir in the stock. Add the sachet and bring to a boil, stirring frequently. Reduce the heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the wine or beer, half-and-half and cheese. Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Strain; adjust seasonings with salt and cayenne pepper. Thin with additional warm half-and-half, if necessary. Serve in warm bowls, garnished with parsley and croutons.

fields.name: Roasted Garlic Pure
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic-head': ['garlic head', '9 ea', 'garlic-head'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '3 fl oz', 'oil-olive']}
fields.directions: Directions: Cut the top from each head of garlic and discard. Place the garlic, cut side up, in a half-hotel pan. Brush the tops of the garlic with oil, then season generously with salt and pepper. Cover the pan and bake at 300F until the garlic softens, approximately 1 hour. Remove the cover and continue baking until any moisture has evaporated and the garlic develops a deep golden color, approximately 15 minutes. Squeeze out the solftened pulp from the cloves. Pure until smooth.

fields.name: Rhubarb Preserves
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '8 fl oz', 'water'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '3 tbl', 'sugar-granulated'], 'wine-port': ['port wine', '2 fl oz', 'wine-port'], 'rhubarb-fresh': ['fresh rhubarb', '4 oz', 'rhubarb-fresh']}
fields.directions: 1 Squeeze the juice from the oranges, lemon and lime. In a medium saucepot, combine the cit-rus juices with the vanilla bean. Bring to a simmer and reduce by two-thirds. Add the cream to the mixture and reduce by two-thirds. Lower the heat and slowly whisk in the butter to form a beurre blanc sauce. Season with salt, strain the sauce and reserve in a warm place.

fields.name: Pho Bo (Hanoi Beef and Noodle Soup)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-tenderloin': ['beef tenderloin', '6 oz', 'beef-tenderloin'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '1 ea', 'ginger-fresh'], 'fish-sauce': ['fish sauceas needed', '', 'fish-sauce'], 'rice-vermicelli': ['rice vermicelli', '1 lb', 'rice-vermicelli'], 'water': ['wateras needed', '', 'water'], 'oxtails': ['oxtails', '4 lb', 'oxtails'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'onion': ['onionas needed', '', 'onion'], 'cinnamon-stick': ['cinnamon stick', '1 ea', 'cinnamon-stick'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '3 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'chile-sauce-vietnamese': ['Vietnamese chile sauceas needed', '', 'chile-sauce-vietnamese'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantroas needed', '', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'beans-mung': ['mung beansas needed', '', 'beans-mung'], 'mint-fresh': ['fresh mintas needed', '', 'mint-fresh'], 'star-anise-whole': ['whole star anise', '8 ea', 'star-anise-whole'], 'pepper-thai-chile': ['Thai chile pepperas needed', '', 'pepper-thai-chile'], 'basil-fresh': ['fresh basilas needed', '', 'basil-fresh'], 'cloves-whole': ['whole cloves', '5 ea', 'cloves-whole'], 'lime': ['limeas needed', '', 'lime']}
fields.directions: Place the oxtails in a stockpot and add enough water to cover them by approximately 4 inches (10 centimeters). Bring it to a boil and then reduce to a simmer, skimming the surface as necessary. Halve and char the onion for an onion brl. Split the ginger lengthwise and char its surface. Add the onion brl, charred ginger, salt, fish sauce and sachet to the stockpot. Simmer the broth for 4 to 5 hours. Remove the sachet and strain the broth through a chinois. Adjust the seasonings and maintain the broth at a simmer. Put the garnishes in bowls or trays and place them on each table. Reheat the vermicelli by dropping them into boiling water for a few seconds. Divide the reheated vermicelli noodles into six large warm bowls. Place several pieces of raw beef ten-derloin on top of each portion of vermicelli. Pour boiling hot broth over the meat into each bowl. Serve the hot broth to the diners, allowing them to garnish their portions with onions, mung beans, herbs, lime wedges, fish sauce, chiles and chile sauce as desired. (The meat will cook when stirred into the hot broth.)

fields.name: Eggs Benedict
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-white': ['white vinegar', '1 fl oz', 'vinegar-white'], 'bacon-canadian': ['Canadian bacon', '2 slice', 'bacon-canadian'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'english-muffin': ['english muffin', '1 ea', 'english-muffin'], 'truffles-black': ['black truffles', '2 slice', 'truffles-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'hollandaise': ['Hollandaise', '4 fl oz', 'hollandaise']}
fields.directions: Toast the English muffin. Saut or griddle the bacon slices until hot. Bring 1 quart (1 liter) water to a boil and add the salt and vinegar. Reduce the heat to a strong simmer. Add the eggs and poach until done. Place the muffins on a plate and top with the bacon slices. Place an egg on each slice of ba-con and cover with the Hollandaise. Garnish each egg with a truffle slice or black olive half and serve. VARIATIONS: Poached Eggs FlorentineServe poached eggs on an English muffin or pastry shell over creamed spinach with hollandaise or bchamel sauce. Poached Eggs Norwegian StyleServe poached eggs on an English muffin with smoked salmon and hollandaise sauce. Poached Eggs Princess StyleServe poached eggs on an English muffin with asparagus tips and hollandaise sauce. Poached Eggs SardouServe poached eggs and creamed spinach on an artichoke bottom with hollandaise sauce.

fields.name: Shortcakes

fields.directions: Combine ingredients using the biscuit method. Cut into 3-inch (7.5-centimeter) circles and space 2 inches (5 centimeters) apart on a paper-lined sheet pan. Bake at 400F (200C) until lightly browned, approximately 15 to 18 minutes. Remove from the oven and brush the tops with melted butter, then sprinkle with granulated sugar.

fields.name: Sour Cream Muffins
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '8 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '1 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'cream-sour': ['sour cream', '10 oz', 'cream-sour'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '10 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'baking-soda': ['baking soda', '1 tsp', 'baking-soda'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Stir the eggs in one at a time. Sift the dry ingredients together. Stir the dry ingredients and sour cream, alternately, into the butter mixture in three additions. Stir in the vanilla extract. Portion the batter into greased muffin cups and bake at 350F (180C) until light brown and set, approximately 20 minutes. Allow the muffins to cool briefly in the pan before removing.

fields.name: Grapefruit Sorbet
fields.ingredient_amount: {'grapefruit-juice-fresh': ['Grapefruit Juice (fresh)', '1 qt', 'grapefruit-juice-fresh'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine the juice and sugar. Process in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturers directions. Pack into a clean container and freeze until firm. VARIATIONS: Mango SorbetCombine 2.2 pounds (1 kilogram) mango pure with 8 fluid ounces (240 millili-ters) medium sugar syrup. Raspberry SorbetCombine 2.2 pounds (1 kilogram) pured, strained raspberries with 1 pound (500 grams) granulated sugar and 1 fluid ounce (30 milliliters) lemon juice.

fields.name: Red Pepper Butter
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-red-bell': ['red bell pepper', '8 oz', 'pepper-red-bell'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Pure 8 ounces (240 grams) roasted, peeled red bell peppers until liquid, then add to the butter.

fields.name: Apple Gele
fields.ingredient_amount: {'gelatin-sheet': ['sheet gelatin', '4 ea', 'gelatin-sheet'], 'apple-juice': ['apple juice', '3 pt', 'apple-juice'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tsp', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'star-anise-whole': ['whole star anise', '1/2 tsp', 'star-anise-whole'], 'apple-granny-smith': ['granny smith apple', '1/2 ea', 'apple-granny-smith'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Add the star anise to the apple juice. Bring the juice to a boil and reduce by half. Season with salt. Cut the apple brunoise and toss with the lemon juice. Soak the gelatin sheets in cold water for approximately 5 minutes. Squeeze out the water and dissolve them in the hot apple juice. Pour the mixture into a shallow pan. Cool over an ice bath. When the mixture begins to set, stir in the brunoise apple so that the apple pieces become suspended in the gele and are evenly dispersed. Refrigerate until firm.

fields.name: Cream Of Tomato Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1/2 oz', 'parsley-fresh'], 'tomato-juice': ['tomato juice', '1 qt', 'tomato-juice'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'water': ['water', '5 pt', 'water'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tbl', 'salt'], 'tomatoes-canned': ['canned tomatoes', '1 #10 Can', 'tomatoes-canned'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2, 8 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '24 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '4 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thymeas needed', '', 'thyme-fresh'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '10 ea', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter'], 'worcestershire-sauce': ['worcestershire sauce', '1 fl oz', 'worcestershire-sauce']}
fields.directions: Sweat the mirepoix in the oil and butter in a heavy saucepan without caramelizing. Deglaze the pan with the tomato juice. Add the water, crushed tomatoes, salt, pepper and sa-chet. Bring to a boil, reduce to a low simmer and cook for 30 minutes. Stir in the Worcestershire sauce and thyme. Continue simmering for 15 minutes. Remove the sachet and pure the soup with an immersion blender until smooth. Strain the scalded cream through a china cap and add it to the soup. Simmer for 5 minutes; adjust the seasonings and serve.

fields.name: Veal Scallops (3 oz)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'veal-top-round': ['veal top round', '6 lb', 'veal-top-round']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board,  trim veal top round of all sliverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut into 3 oz. scallops. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Peanut Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pork-fat': ['pork fat', '6 oz', 'pork-fat'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 pt', 'chicken-stock'], 'water': ['water', '4 fl oz', 'water'], 'vinegar-cider': ['cider vinegar', '1 tbl', 'vinegar-cider'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'peanut-butter': ['peanut butter', '4 oz', 'peanut-butter'], 'cornstarch': ['cornstarch', '2 tbl', 'cornstarch'], 'soy-sauce': ['soy sauce', '1 tbl', 'soy-sauce'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Cook the trimmed pork fat in a saucepan to render 1 fluid ounce (30 milliliters) of rendered fat. Discard the remaining fat. 2 Saut the garlic and cayenne pepper in the rendered fat without browning. 3 Combine the vinegar, soy sauce, stock, salt and deglazing liquid  (3 fl oz from pork roast. Add it to the garlic. Stir in the peanut butter until it blends. 4 Combine the cornstarch and water. Stir this slurry into the sauce. Return the sauce to a sim-mer. Do not allow it to boil or it will curdle. Hold in a warm spot for service.

fields.name: Glace de Viande
fields.ingredient_amount: {'brown-veal-stock': ['Brown Veal Stock', '1 gal', 'brown-veal-stock']}
fields.directions: Simmer the stock over very low heat. Be careful not to let it burn, and skim it often. As it reduces and the volume decreases, transfer the liquid into progressively smaller sauce-pans. Strain the liquid each time it is transferred into a smaller saucepan. Strain it a final time, cool and refrigerate. A properly made glaze will keep for several months under refrigeration.

fields.name: Suprme Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chicken-velouta': ['Chicken VeloutÃ©', '1 gal', 'chicken-velouta'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '8 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 qt', 'cream-heavy'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Simmer the velout sauce with the mushroom trimmings until reduced by one-fourth. Gradually whisk in the cream and return to a simmer. Adjust the seasonings. Strain through a china cap lined with cheesecloth.

fields.name: Garlic Cilantro Sauce

fields.name: Corned Beef Hash
fields.ingredient_amount: {'potato-white': ['white potato', '1, 8 lb', 'potato-white'], 'onion': ['onion', '8 oz', 'onion'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'parsnip': ['parsnip', '4 oz', 'parsnip'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '2 oz', 'carrot'], 'beef-brisket-corned': ['corned beef brisket', '2 lb', 'beef-brisket-corned']}
fields.directions: Peel and quarter the potatoes. Simmer them in a saucepan of salted water until tender. Drain the potatoes, allow them to cool completely then coarsely chop them. Saut the onions, carrots and parsnips in 1 ounce (30 milliliters) oil over medium heat until tender. Remove the vegetables from the pan and let them cool. Combine the cubed potatoes, sauted vegetables and corned beef and grind through the me-dium die of a meat grinder. Combine the ground mixture with the eggs. Season with salt and pepper. (The hash may be prepared to this point and refrigerated until needed.) Form the mixture into 6-ounce (180-gram) patties or divide the mixture between 12 greased ring molds. Heat the remaining oil in a large saut pan over medium heat. Add the hash patties or the ring molds of hash. Cook until heated through, turning once when well browned on the first side. (Slide off the ring molds, if using, before serving.) Serve with fried or poached eggs.

fields.name: Hungarian Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '2 oz', 'onion'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '1 tbl', 'paprika'], 'supra-me-sauce': ['SuprÃªme Sauce', '1 qt', 'supra-me-sauce'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 tbl', 'butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Sweat 2 ounces (60 grams) diced onion in 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) whole butter. Add 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) paprika. Stir in suprme sauce. Cook for 2 to 3 minutes, strain and finish with whole butter. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: New England Boiled Dinner
fields.ingredient_amount: {'allspice-whole': ['whole allspice', '4 ea', 'allspice-whole'], 'brussel-sprouts': ['brussel sprouts', '24 ea', 'brussel-sprouts'], 'pepper-cracked-black': ['cracked black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-cracked-black'], 'turnips-baby': ['baby turnips', '24 ea', 'turnips-baby'], 'mustard-seeds': ['mustard seeds', '1 tbl', 'mustard-seeds'], 'beef-brisket-corned': ['corned beef brisket', '8 lb', 'beef-brisket-corned'], 'cinnamon-stick': ['cinnamon stick', '2 ea', 'cinnamon-stick'], 'potato-red-bliss': ['red bliss potato', '24 ea', 'potato-red-bliss'], 'carrots-baby': ['baby carrots', '24 ea', 'carrots-baby'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '10 ea', 'parsley-fresh'], 'white-stock': ['White Stockas needed', '', 'white-stock'], 'beets-baby-red': ['baby red beets', '24 ea', 'beets-baby-red'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'onion-pearl': ['pearl onion', '24 ea', 'onion-pearl']}
fields.directions: Place the beef in a pot and add enough stock to cover it. Add the sachet, bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Simmer until the beef is tender, approximately 3 hours. Remove the beef and hold in a hotel pan in a small amount of the cooking liquid. Peel or prepare the vegetables and potatoes as needed and cook separately in a portion of the cooking liquid. Carve the beef and serve with two of each of the vegetables and horseradish sauce (page 203).

fields.name: Barnaise
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-white-wine': ['white wine vinegar', '8 fl oz', 'vinegar-white-wine'], 'chervil-fresh': ['fresh chervil', '3 tbl', 'chervil-fresh'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 oz', 'shallot'], 'hollandaise': ['Hollandaise', '1 qt', 'hollandaise'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'tarragon-fresh': ['fresh tarragonas needed', '', 'tarragon-fresh'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Combine 2 ounces (60 grams) chopped shallots, 5 tablespoons (75 milliliters) chopped fresh tarragon, 3 tablespoons (45 milliliters) chopped fresh chervil and 1 teaspoon (5 milliliters) crushed peppercorns with 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) white wine vinegar. Reduce to 2 fluid ounces (60 milliliters). Add this reduction to the egg yolks and proceed with the hollandaise recipe. Strain the finished sauce and season  to taste with salt and cayenne pepper. Garnish with additional chopped fresh tarragon.

fields.name: Chocolate Shavings
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chocolate-dark': ['dark chocolate', '1 lb', 'chocolate-dark']}
fields.directions: PROCEDURE FOR MAKING TEMPERED CHOCOLATE SHAVINGS Spread tempered couverture chocolate evenly on a marble slab. Allow to set slightly. Using a metal dough scraper, scrape chocolate forward in a 90-degree angle with a quick mo-tion. If chocolate smears on the scraper, wait a few seconds. If it flakes, it has cooled too much. Rub a gloved hand over the chocolate surface to slightly soften it. PROCEDURE FOR MAKING UNTEMPERED CHOCOLATE SHAVINGS Select a totally flat sheet pan. Warm the sheet pan to 80F (27C) by placing it in a warm oven. Spread nontempered melted couverture chocolate on the back of the sheet pan. 2  Refrigerate the sheet pan until the couverture has hardened. Remove from the refrigerator. Let the chocolate soften slightly. Hold a plastic scraper at a 90-degree angle to the sheet pan and scrape 1-inch (2.5-centimeter) curls from the pan. Transfer the shavings directly onto the cake, tart or pastry. Serve as soon as possible because the untempered chocolate will bloom under refrigeration.

fields.name: Lime Juice (fresh)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lime': ['lime', '2 ea', 'lime']}
fields.directions: Wash limes                                                                                          2) Juice limes by hand or with electric juicer.                               3) Strain through fine mesh strainer.

fields.name: Sauted Calves Liver with Onions
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '1, 8 lb', 'onion'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'veal-calves-liver': ['veal calves liver', '3, 12 lb', 'veal-calves-liver'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flouras needed', '', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '3 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Saut the onions in 1 fluid ounce (30 milliliters) clarified butter until golden brown. Season with salt and pepper. Add the wine, cover and braise until the onions are tender, approximately 10 minutes. Stir in the parsley. Dredge the liver in flour seasoned with salt and pepper. In a separate pan, saut the liver in the remaining clarified butter until done. The liver should be slightly pink in the middle. Serve the liver with a portion of the onions and their cooking liquid.

fields.name: Thyme Merlot Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lamb-stock': ['Lamb Stock', '20 fl oz', 'lamb-stock'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 tsp', 'shallot'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 tsp', 'thyme-fresh'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1/4 tsp', 'garlic'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '1 tbl', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'wine-merlot': ['merlot wine', '6 fl oz', 'wine-merlot']}
fields.directions: 1 Saut the garlic and shallots in the clarified butter until translucent. Add the wine, bay leaf and thyme and reduce by half. Add the stock and reduce by half again. Strain and season  to taste. Hold for service

fields.name: Roasted Poblano Chile and Corn Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-poblano-chile': ['poblano chile pepperas needed', '', 'pepper-poblano-chile'], 'corn-fresh': ['fresh corn', '8 ea', 'corn-fresh'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '8 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'corn-kernels-frozen': ['frozen corn kernelsas needed', '', 'corn-kernels-frozen'], 'tortilla-corn': ['corn tortillaas needed', '', 'tortilla-corn'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '3 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 pt', 'cream-heavy'], 'cream-sour': ['sour cream', '1 pt', 'cream-sour'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '2 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '1, 4 lb', 'carrot'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'onion': ['onion', '1, 12 lb', 'onion'], 'lime': ['lime', '1 ea', 'lime']}
fields.directions: Squeeze the juice from the lime and combine it with the sour cream. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Rub the chiles with 1 fluid ounce (30 milliliters) vegetable oil and place on a sheet pan. Roast the chiles at 450F (230C) until well blistered, approximately 10 to 15 minutes. Remove them from the oven and cool. Peel the chiles, remove the seeds and veins, then coarsely chop them. Roast the ears of corn in their husks at 450F (230C) for 10 to 15 minutes. Allow the ears to cool, then shuck them and cut the kernels from the cob. Heat a saut pan on the stove top until very hot. Toss the onions, carrots and garlic cloves in the remaining oil. Drop the vegetables into the hot pan and allow them to char. Stir occasion-ally to char them evenly. Transfer the charred vegetables to a heavy soup pot. Add the roasted chiles and corn kernels to the pot. Add enough stock to cover the ingredients, then bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Simmer until the ingredients are tender, ap-proximately 30 minutes. Pure the soup in a blender or food processor and strain if desired. Return the soup to the same pot, add the cream and reduce to the desired consistency. Season  to taste with salt and pepper. Serve the soup garnished with julienne of poblano chile, corn kernels, fried tortilla strips and the lime-flavored sour cream.

fields.name: Togarishi Yams
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 pt', 'cream-heavy'], 'yams': ['yams', '5 lb', 'yams'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '8 oz', 'butter'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'togarishi': ['togarishi', '1 tbl', 'togarishi']}
fields.directions: 1 Simmer the yams in salted water until tender. Drain well. Place the yams, butter, cream and togarishi in the bowl of a mixer fitted with a paddle. Mix on low until the mixture reaches the desired consistency. Do not overmix. Adjust the seasonings with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Simple Syrup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '16 fl oz', 'water'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '16 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine ingredients in heavy-bottomed stainless saucepan. Boil for 1 minute. This concentration would measure 2830 on the Baum scale, and the solution should be at 220F (104C). Store in clean container in refrigerator.

fields.name: Garlic Tuiles
fields.ingredient_amount: {'roasted-garlic-pura-e': ['Roasted Garlic PurÃ©e', '2 fl oz', 'roasted-garlic-pura-e'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '2 oz', 'parsley-fresh'], 'cheese-grated-parmesan': ['grated parmesan cheese', '8 oz', 'cheese-grated-parmesan'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 lb', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '10 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '8 ea', 'egg-whites'], 'salt': ['salt', '4 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '7 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: 1 Cream the butter, sugar and salt together. Add the egg whites one at a time while mixing until they are all incorporated. 2 Add the flour, garlic pure, Parmesan and parsley to the mixture and mix until smooth. Re-frigerate for 1 hour before using. 3 Using approximately   ounces (45 grams) of batter, form a rectangular strip approximately 6 inches (15 centimeters) long and   inches (3.5 centimeters) wide on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat. A pastry bag fitted with an appropriate tip works well for this purpose. Repeat placing up to 6 strips on the sheet. 4 Bake the batter at 350F (180C) for 5 to 7 minutes or until the strips of batter are nicely browned on the edges and pale in the center. 5 Working quickly before the tuiles cool, remove them from the pan using a spatula and wrap them around a large rolling pin to form rings. 6 When cool the tuiles will be crisp. Hold in a dry area until needed for service. 7 For service, toss the romaine leaves in dressing and carefully arrange them in the tuile rings on chilled serving plates.

fields.name: White Sandwich Bread
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1/2 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'milk-nonfat-dry': ['nonfat dry milk', '1 1/4 oz', 'milk-nonfat-dry'], 'flour-bread': ['bread flour', '1, 8 lb', 'flour-bread'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'water': ['water', '12 fl oz', 'water'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine the water, milk powder, sugar, salt, yeast and 12 ounces (340 grams) flour. Blend well. Add the butter and eggs and beat for 2 minutes. Stir in the remaining flour, 2 ounces (60 grams) at a time. Knead until the dough is smooth and elastic, approximately 8 minutes. Place the dough in a lightly greased bowl, cover and let it ferment at room temperature until doubled, approximately 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Shape into loaves, pan and proof until doubled. Bake at 400F (200C) if free-form or small loaves; bake at 375F (190C) if larger loaves. Bake until brown and hollow sounding, approximately 35 minutes for small loaves and 50 minutes for large loaves.

fields.name: Cilantro Chutney
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cumin-whole': ['whole cumin', '2 tsp', 'cumin-whole'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '2 tbl', 'ginger-fresh'], 'lime-juice-fresh': ['Lime Juice (fresh)', '1 tbl', 'lime-juice-fresh'], 'oil-canola': ['canola oil', '1 tbl', 'oil-canola'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 tsp', 'garlic'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'honey': ['honey', '2 tbl', 'honey'], 'almonds-sliced': ['sliced almonds', '3 tbl', 'almonds-sliced'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '3 bunch', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'pepper-jalapeno-chile': ['jalapeno chile pepper', '3 ea', 'pepper-jalapeno-chile']}
fields.directions: 1 Place all ingredients in a blender and blend to a pestolike consistency.

fields.name: Duxelles
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butter', '1/2 oz', 'butter'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 tbl', 'shallot'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '1 lb', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Chop the mushrooms very finely. Saut the shallots and garlic in the butter until tender. Add the mushrooms and saut until dry. Season with salt and pepper and add the parsley. Cool and then use the duxelles as a stuffing for vegetables or as a flavoring ingredient in other recipes.

fields.name: Basic Pie Dough
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-granulated'], 'flour-pastry': ['pastry flour', '1, 6 lb', 'flour-pastry'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '4 fl oz', 'buttermilk'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tbl', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: Cut butter into medium dice 3/8 inch (9 millimeters) square. Sift the flour onto a work surface or into a large bowl. Cut the butter into the flour mixture until the desired consistency (flaky or mealy) is reached. Combine the buttermilk, salt, sugar and vanilla (if using) in a bowl with a whisk. Gradually add the buttermilk to the flour mixture. Mix gently until the dough holds together. Do not overmix or add too much liquid. Cover the dough with plastic wrap and chill thoroughly before using.

fields.name: Cream Scones
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '0.4 oz', 'baking-powder'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '1.3 oz', 'egg-yolks'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '4 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'cream-half-half': ['half & half cream', '11 fl oz', 'cream-half-half'], 'salt': ['salt', '0.2 oz', 'salt'], 'baking-soda': ['baking soda', '0.14 oz', 'baking-soda'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1.5 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine all ingredients using the biscuit method.  Roll out the dough to a thickness of approximately 1/2 inch (1.2 centimeters). Cut as desired.  Bake at 400F (200C) for approximately 10 minutes.  Brush the tops with butter while hot. Serve warm with clotted cream and jam. VARIATIONS: Add 4 ounces (120 grams/25%) raisins, sultanas or currants to the ingredients.

fields.name: Basic Sugar Glaze
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugar', '9 1/2 oz', 'sugar-confectioners'], 'cream-light': ['light cream', '2 fl oz', 'cream-light'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '2 tsp', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: Stir the ingredients together in a small bowl until smooth. Adjust the consistency by adding more cream or milk to thin the glaze if necessary. Adjust the flavor as necessary. Use immediately, before the glaze begins to dry. VARIATION: Flavored Sugar GlazeStir 1/4 teaspoon (1 milliliter) lemon or orange oil into the glaze. Fruit juice and other flavorings may be substituted for the vanilla extract.  Note: Vanilla extract can be replaced by lemon or almond.

fields.name: Caramel Filling
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 pt', 'cream-heavy'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'glucose': ['glucose', '12 oz', 'glucose'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 lb', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: 1 Bring the butter, 4 ounces (120 grams) of sugar and the cream to a boil. Set aside. 2 In a separate large saucepan, warm the glucose until it liquefies. Add the remaining sugar. 3 Continue heating the glucose and sugar until the mixture caramelizes to a dark brown. Turn off the heat. 4 Slowly add the cream mixture to the caramel. Be very careful, as this will bubble wildly. Also, to avoid steam burns, do not place your hands above the boiling caramel. When the boiling begins to subside, stir with a wooden spoon. Repeat this process until all of the cream has been added. 5 Return the pan to the heat and cook to a temperature of 236F (113C). Strain and allow to cool thoroughly before using.

fields.name: Shallot Curry Oil
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '2 fl oz', 'water'], 'curry-powder': ['curry powder', '4 tbl', 'curry-powder'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 ea', 'shallot'], 'oil-canola': ['canola oil', '8 fl oz', 'oil-canola']}
fields.directions: In a small saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) oil over medium heat. Add the shallot and saut until softened and translucent. Do not allow the shallot to brown. Add the curry powder and saut for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the water and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer until most of the water evaporates, leaving a paste of curry and shallots. Remove from the heat and stir in the remaining oil. Place the mixture in a lidded jar and set aside at room temperature for 6 to 8 hours. Shake the jar occasionally. Strain the oil through a chinois lined with a coffee filter. Place the flavored oil in a covered container and refrigerate until ready to use.

fields.name: Chicken Curry Spread
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-of-coconut': ['cream of coconut', '4 fl oz', 'cream-of-coconut'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tbl', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'mayonnaise': ['mayonnaise', '4 fl oz', 'mayonnaise'], 'curry-powder': ['curry powder', '1 1/2 tbl', 'curry-powder'], 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless': ['boneless skinless chicken breast', '1 lb', 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Cut the chicken into small pieces and place in a food processor. Pulse until a fine texture is obtained. Add the remaining ingredients and mix until blended. Refrigerate until needed, but use within 2 days. VARIATION: For a mixture that can be piped into barquettes or used as a garnish, process the chicken until very smooth and add 23 ounces (6090 grams) plain cream cheese.

fields.name: Lime Juice
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lime': ['lime', '2 ea', 'lime']}
fields.directions: Wash limes                                                                                          2) Juice limes by hand or with electric juicer.                                                                             3) Strain through fine mesh strainer.

fields.name: Applesauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tbl', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '5 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'cinnamon-stick': ['cinnamon stick', '2 ea', 'cinnamon-stick'], 'apple-mcintosh': ['McIntosh apple', '4 lb', 'apple-mcintosh']}
fields.directions: Peel, core and quarter the apples. Place in a saucepan with just enough cold water to cover the bottom of the pan. Add the cinnamon sticks. Bring to a simmer, cover and cook until the apples are tender, approximately 15 minutes. Add the sugar and lemon juice. Simmer for 10 minutes. Remove the cinnamon sticks and press the apples through a food mill.

fields.name: Spanish Romesco Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chili-powder': ['chili powder', '1/2 tsp', 'chili-powder'], 'oil-extra-virgin-olive': ['extra virgin olive oil', '6 fl oz', 'oil-extra-virgin-olive'], 'hazelnuts-whole-unblanched': ['whole unblanched hazelnuts', '2 oz', 'hazelnuts-whole-unblanched'], 'parsley-fresh-italian': ['fresh Italian parsley', '1 tbl', 'parsley-fresh-italian'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '3 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '2 tsp', 'paprika'], 'pepper-red-bell': ['red bell pepper', '1, 12 lb', 'pepper-red-bell'], 'vinegar-sherry': ['sherry vinegar', '4 fl oz', 'vinegar-sherry'], 'almonds-sliced': ['sliced almonds', '2 oz', 'almonds-sliced'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Roast the bell peppers over the open flame of a gas burner. Peel them, remove the seeds and chop them coarsely. Toast the almonds and hazelnuts in a dry saut pan. Cool them and grind them in the bowl of a food processor until they are almost a paste. Add the bell peppers, garlic, Italian parsley, paprika and chilli powder to the bowl of the pro-cessor and pulse to combine the ingredients. Add the vinegar and pure to a smooth paste. With the processor running, add the oil in a slow stream to emulsify the sauce. Season  to taste.

fields.name: Chteaubriand
fields.ingredient_amount: {'ba-arnaise': ['BÃ©arnaise', '4 fl oz', 'ba-arnaise'], 'beef-tenderloin': ['beef tenderloin', '24 oz', 'beef-tenderloin'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butteras needed', '', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Tie the beef with butchers twine and season with salt and pepper. Saut the beef in clarified butter until it is well browned. Transfer the beef to a 450F (230C) oven and roast until done, approximately 10 to 12 mi-nutes for rare (internal temperature of 125F/52C), or 15 to 18 minutes for medium (140F/60C). Remove the beef from the oven and allow it to rest for at least 5 minutes before carving. At service time, slice the beef evenly on a slight diagonal bias. Serve napped with the bar-naise sauce.

fields.name: Avocado Relish
fields.ingredient_amount: {'tomato-concassa': ['Tomato ConcassÃ©', '4 tbl', 'tomato-concassa'], 'onion': ['onion', '3 tbl', 'onion'], 'lime': ['lime', '1 ea', 'lime'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 tbl', 'oil-olive'], 'avocado': ['avocado', '2 ea', 'avocado'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin', '1/2 tsp', 'cumin-ground'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '2 tbl', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'pepper-jalapeno-chile': ['jalapeno chile pepper', '1 ea', 'pepper-jalapeno-chile']}
fields.directions: 1 Juice the lime. 2 Combine the lime juice with the remaining ingredients and mix well.

fields.name: Muscat Pastry Cream
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vanilla-bean': ['vanilla bean', '1/2 ea', 'vanilla-bean'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '12 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'wine-orange-muscat': ['orange muscat wine', '2 fl oz', 'wine-orange-muscat'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'milk': ['milk', '1 pt', 'milk'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '4 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'cornstarch': ['cornstarch', '2 oz', 'cornstarch'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/8 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: 1 Reserve 2 fluid ounces (60 milliliters) of the milk. Place the remaining milk in a saucepot and add the vanilla bean and its seeds. Scald the milk. 2 Combine the cornstarch with 7 ounces (210 grams) of the sugar, the salt and the reserved milk and whisk until smooth. Add the eggs and yolks and mix until they are incorporated and the mixture is smooth. 3 Temper the cornstarch mixture with some of the scalded milk and return the mixture to the saucepot with the remaining milk. Whisk and cook over medium heat until the mixture has thickened and begins to boil. 4 Remove the pastry cream from the heat and pour into a hotel pan. Remove the vanilla bean. Lay plastic wrap over the surface of the pastry cream and refrigerate until completely cold. 5 Whip the chilled pastry cream until smooth, approximately 1 minute. Add the wine and whip to combine. 6 Whip the heavy cream with the remaining sugar to stiff peaks. Combine the whipped pastry cream and the whipped cream and whip together, scraping down the bowl as necessary. Re-frigerate until ready to use.

fields.name: Chocolate Spongecake
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '5.5 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '7.5 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'sugar-confectioners': ['confectioners sugar', '1.75 oz', 'sugar-confectioners'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '13 oz', 'eggs'], 'cocoa-powder': ['cocoa powder', '1.75 oz', 'cocoa-powder'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '0.3 fl oz', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: MISE EN PLACE  Preheat oven to 350F (180C).  Sift flour.  Butter the bottom and sides of two 9-inch (22-centimeter) cake pans. Let the butter cool, then flour the pans. Set aside.  Separate the eggs, placing the yolks and the whites in separate mixing bowls. Whip the egg yolks and 5  ounces (60 grams) of the sugar on medium speed until thick, pale and at least doubled in volume, approximately 3 to 5 minutes. The yolks should be whipped until ribbons form.  Place the bowl of egg whites on a mixer fitted with a clean whip attachment and beat on medium speed until foamy. Gradually add the remaining sugar and vanilla. Whip at medium speed until the whites are glossy and hold firm peaks but are not dry.  Pour the egg yolks onto the whipped whites. Quickly fold the two mixtures together.  Sprinkle one-third of the sifted flour over the batter and delicately fold in. Repeat the procedure until all the flour is incorporated. Do not overmix; fold just until incorporated.  Pour the batter into the prepared pans, smoothing the surface as needed. Bake at 350F (180C) until the cakes are golden brown and bounce back when lightly pressed in the center, approximately 25 minutes.  Allow the cakes to cool on a wire rack for 10 to 15 minutes before unmolding.  To remove the cakes from their pans, run a thin metal spatula around the edge of each pan if necessary. When the cake is completely cool, it can be frosted or wrapped in plastic and frozen for 2 to 3 months. VARIATION: Chocolate SpongecakeReduce the flour to 5.5 ounces (165 grams/78%). Sift it together with 1.75 ounces (50 grams/25%) cocoa powder and 1.75 ounces (50 grams/25%) powdered sugar. Fold in as described in Step 5.

fields.name: Pizza Dough
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1 tbl', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'flour-bread': ['bread flour', '14 oz', 'flour-bread'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 tbl', 'oil-olive'], 'water': ['water', '6 fl oz', 'water'], 'honey': ['honey', '1 tbl', 'honey'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Stir the yeast into the warm water to dissolve. Add the flour. Stir the remaining ingredients into the flour mixture. Knead with a dough hook or by hand until smooth and elastic, approximately 5 minutes. Place the dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover. Allow the dough to ferment in a warm place for 30 minutes. Punch down the dough and divide into portions. The dough may be wrapped and refrigerated for up to 2 days. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough into very thin rounds and top as desired. Bake at 400F (200C) until crisp and golden brown, approximately 8 to 12 minutes.

fields.name: Red Onion, Tomato and Balsamic Salsa
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-balsamic': ['balsamic vinegar', '2 fl oz', 'vinegar-balsamic'], 'onion-red': ['red onion', '1 ea', 'onion-red'], 'tomato-concassa': ['Tomato ConcassÃ©', '2 1/4 cup', 'tomato-concassa'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/8 tsp', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl. Cover and chill until ready to serve.

fields.name: Lime Rind
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lime': ['lime', '3 ea', 'lime']}
fields.directions: Wash lime                                                                                            2) Peel rind, avoiding white pith.                                                   3) Dice or julienne with sharp knife

fields.name: Turtle Cheesecake
fields.ingredient_amount: {'walnut-halves': ['walnut halves', '5 oz', 'walnut-halves'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '6 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'water': ['water', '3 fl oz', 'water'], 'honey': ['honey', '2 oz', 'honey'], 'corn-syrup-light': ['light corn syrup', '1 1/2 oz', 'corn-syrup-light'], 'cra-me-chantilly-chantilly-cream': ['CrÃ¨me Chantilly (Chantilly Cream)as needed', '', 'cra-me-chantilly-chantilly-cream'], 'pecan-halves': ['pecan halves', '4 oz', 'pecan-halves'], 'new-york-cheesecake': ['New York Cheesecake', '2 ea', 'new-york-cheesecake'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1/2 fl oz', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: In a deep saucepan, bring the sugar, corn syrup and water to a boil. Wash down any crystals that cling to the sides of the pan with a brush dipped in water. Cook the mixture without stirring until it turns a golden caramel color, approximately 350F (175C). Add the honey and heated cream; be aware that the caramel mixture will rise when these in-gredients are added. Reboil the mixture until it darkens to a medium amber color, approx-imately 3 to 4 minutes. Remove from heat and add walnuts and pecans. Let cool to room temperature, then stir in the vanilla. Spread the warmed icing over the cheesecakes. Once the caramel topping has cooled, deco-rate with Crme Chantilly (if using). Let the caramel filling set before cutting.

fields.name: Lobster Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lobster-bodies': ['lobster bodies', '3 lb', 'lobster-bodies'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'water': ['water', '24 fl oz', 'water'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '1/2 ea', 'carrot'], 'onion': ['onion', '1 ea', 'onion'], 'tomato-juice': ['tomato juice', '24 fl oz', 'tomato-juice'], 'fennel-bulb': ['fennel bulb', '1/2 ea', 'fennel-bulb'], 'brandy': ['brandy', '2 fl oz', 'brandy'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 oz', 'butter'], 'leeks': ['leeks', '1 ea', 'leeks'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1 pinch', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: 1 Melt the butter in a saucepot. Sweat the onion, leek, fennel and carrot until soft, approximate-ly 10 minutes. Flamb with the brandy as described in Chapter 7 and add the lobster shells. Add the wine and reduce by half. 2 Add the tomato juice, water, bay leaves and cayenne pepper. Bring to a boil, skim and sim-mer for 1 hour. Strain and cool

fields.name: Mushroom Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh) to taste', '', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 qt', 'demi-glace'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '8 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'water': ['water', '8 fl oz', 'water'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Blanch 8 ounces (240 grams) mushroom caps in 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) boiling water seasoned with salt and lemon juice. Drain the mushrooms, saving the liquid. Reduce this liquid to 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) and add it to the demi-glace. Just before service stir in 2 ounces (60 grams) whole butter and the mushroom caps. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Poppy Seed Dressing
fields.ingredient_amount: {'celery': ['celery', '2 tsp', 'celery'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '1 ea', 'onion-green'], 'poppy-seed': ['poppy seed', '1.5 tbl', 'poppy-seed'], 'vinegar-cider': ['cider vinegar', '8 fl oz', 'vinegar-cider'], 'honey': ['honey', '6 fl oz', 'honey'], 'mustard-dry': ['dry mustard', '1 tsp', 'mustard-dry'], 'salt': ['salt', '3/4 tsp', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '8 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable']}
fields.directions: Combine the vinegar, honey, salt, mustard, celery leaves and green onion. Beat in the oil, by droplets at first, then in a thin stream. Add the poppy seeds and beat to distribute. Note: For a creamier texture, make the dressing in a blender or food processor.

fields.name: Morning Glory Muffins
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pecan-pieces': ['pecan pieces', '4 oz', 'pecan-pieces'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'apple': ['apple', '6 oz', 'apple'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '4 tsp', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'oil-corn': ['corn oil', '10 1/2 fl oz', 'oil-corn'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tbl', 'salt'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '14 oz', 'carrot'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '4 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'coconut-shredded': ['shredded coconut', '4 oz', 'coconut-shredded'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '6 ea', 'eggs'], 'raisins-dark': ['dark raisins', '6 oz', 'raisins-dark'], 'baking-soda': ['baking soda', '4 tsp', 'baking-soda'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '18 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Sift the dry ingredients together and set aside. Combine the carrots, raisins, pecans, coconut and apple. Whisk together the eggs, oil and vanilla extract. Toss the carrot mixture into the dry ingredients. Then add the liquid ingredients, stirring just until combined.

fields.name: Chocolate Pots De Crme
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chocolate-bittersweet': ['bittersweet chocolate', '8 oz', 'chocolate-bittersweet'], 'kahlua': ['kahlua', '1 fl oz', 'kahlua'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '7 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'milk': ['milk', '1 pt', 'milk'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '7 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Heat the milk just to a simmer. Add the chocolate and sugar. Stir constantly until the choco-late melts; do not allow the mixture to boil. Remove from the heat and add the vanilla and li-queur. Whisk the egg yolks together, then slowly whisk them into the chocolate mixture. Pour the custard into ramekins. Place the ramekins in a hotel pan and add enough hot water to reach halfway up the sides of the ramekins. Bake at 325F (160C) until the custards are almost set in the center, approximately 30 mi-nutes. Remove from the water bath and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled. Serve garnished with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

fields.name: Ricotta Cheese
fields.ingredient_amount: {'milk': ['milk', '1 qt', 'milk'], 'lime-juice-fresh': ['Lime Juice (fresh)', '3 fl oz', 'lime-juice-fresh']}
fields.directions: Allow the milk to reach room temperature in a covered container. In a stainless steel saucepan slowly heat the milk to 180F (82C), stirring often. Hold the heated milk at 180F (82C) for 5 minutes. Remove the milk from the heat and gently stir it while adding the lime juice. Continue to stir until curds form. Gently pour the curds into a strainer or china cap lined with new, rinsed cheesecloth. Allow the whey (liquid) to separate and drain away from the curds (solids). Discard the whey. Allow the cheese to rest undisturbed for 1 hour. For a firm, dry ricotta, lift the corners of the cheesecloth and tie them together with twine. Suspend the bag in a tall, covered container, place it in the refrigerator and allow the cheese to drain for 4 hours or overnight. Unwrap the cheese. Season it with salt if desired. Use the cheese as you would use commer-cially produced ricotta.

fields.name: Classic Rice Pilaf
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '3 oz', 'onion'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '1 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'rice-long-grain': ['long grain rice', '1 lb', 'rice-long-grain'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Heat the butter and oil in a heavy sautoir or saucepot. Add the onion and bay leaf and saut until the onion is tender, but not brown. Add the rice and stir to coat it completely with the hot fat. Do not allow the rice to brown. Pour in the boiling stock and season with salt. Cover the pot tightly and place it in a 350F (180C) oven. Bake until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is fluffy and tender, approximately 18 to 20 minutes. Transfer the cooked rice to a hotel pan and fluff the rice with a fork. Remove the bay leaf and keep the rice hot for service. VARIATION: Spanish RiceSubstitute 2 ounces (60 grams) bacon fat for the butter. Add three chopped garlic cloves and 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) pure ground chilli powder with the diced onion. In Step 3, saut the rice until it browns slightly. In place of the chicken stock, use half chicken stock and half chopped canned tomatoes with juice. Add 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) chopped cilantro when adding the liquids

fields.name: Red Wine Marinade
fields.ingredient_amount: {'wine-red': ['red wine', '1 qt', 'wine-red'], 'onion': ['onion', '2 oz', 'onion'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'juniper-berries': ['juniper berries', '2 tsp', 'juniper-berries'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'vinegar-red-wine': ['red wine vinegar', '4 fl oz', 'vinegar-red-wine'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '2 oz', 'carrot'], 'sage-rubbed': ['rubbed sage', '1/2 tsp', 'sage-rubbed']}
fields.directions: Combine all ingredients. Place the meat in the marinade and marinate for the desired time. Tender, farm-raised game may need only 30 minutes; older, wild animals may need 1 to 2 days.

fields.name: Dauphine Potatoes
fields.ingredient_amount: {'duchesse-potatoes': ['Duchesse Potatoes', '2 lb', 'duchesse-potatoes']}
fields.directions: Combine the Duchesse Potatoes with the clair Paste while both mixtures are still warm. Pipe the mixture into the desired shapes onto strips of parchment paper. Chill until ready to cook. At service, deep-fry by carefully sliding the pieces of paper into the fryer; remove the paper with tongs when the potatoes float loose. Cook until golden brown. VARIATION: LoretteAdd 4 ounces (120 grams) grated Parmesan in Step 2. Pipe the mixture into small cres-cents on pieces of parchment paper. Deep-fry by carefully sliding the pieces of paper into the fryer; remove the paper with tongs when the potatoes float loose.

fields.name: Irish Soda Bread
fields.ingredient_amount: {'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '1 1/2 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'currants': ['currants', '2 oz', 'currants'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'whiskey-irish': ['Irish whiskey', '1 1/2 fl oz', 'whiskey-irish'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '12 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '1 pt', 'buttermilk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'baking-soda': ['baking soda', '1 tsp', 'baking-soda']}
