fields.name: Beef Broth
fields.ingredient_amount: {'turnips-white': ['white turnips', '8 oz', 'turnips-white'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '2 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'beef-stock': ['Beef Stock', '8 qt', 'beef-stock'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '8 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'beef-shank': ['beef shank', '12 lb', 'beef-shank'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '8 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'leeks': ['leeks', '8 oz', 'leeks'], 'tomatoes-fresh': ['fresh tomatoes', '8 oz', 'tomatoes-fresh']}
fields.directions: Brown the meat in 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) oil, then place it in a stockpot. Add the stock or water and bring to a simmer. Simmer gently for 2 hours, skimming the surface as necessary. After the meat has simmered for 2 hours, caramelize the mirepoix in the remaining oil and add it to the liquid. Add the turnips, leeks, tomatoes and sachet. Simmer until full flavor has developed, approximately 1 hour. Skim the surface as necessary. Carefully strain the broth through cheesecloth and season  to taste. Cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Rolled Souffl
fields.ingredient_amount: {'duxelles': ['Duxelles', '12 oz', 'duxelles'], 'watercress': ['watercress', '1 bunch', 'watercress'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '2 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'cheese-grated-parmesan': ['grated parmesan cheese', '4 oz', 'cheese-grated-parmesan'], 'butter': ['butteras needed', '', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 tbl', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'milk': ['milk', '8 fl oz', 'milk'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '6 ea', 'eggs'], 'aurora-sauce': ['Aurora Sauce', '1 qt', 'aurora-sauce']}
fields.directions: Grease a half-sheet pan with butter and line it with parchment paper. Heat 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) butter in a small saucepan. Add the flour and cook to make a blond roux. Slowly add the milk to the roux to form a paste. Bring slowly to a simmer and continue to cook for 10 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer the sauce to a stainless steel bowl. Beat the egg yolks into the sauce. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites with a balloon whisk until stiff, shiny peaks form. Stir approximately one-third of the whites into the sauce and yolk mixture. Gently fold in another one-third of the whites and repeat with the last one-third of the whites. Fold in the Parmesan. Spread the mixture onto the prepared half-sheet pan. Bake at 350F (180C) until done, ap-proximately 15 minutes. Keep the oven door closed during cooking. Remove the souffl from the oven and separate it from the edges of the pan with a paring knife. Turn the souffl out onto a clean surface. Spread the Duxelles over the entire surface of the souffl. Roll it up into a tight log, making sure the paper does not get rolled up with the souffl. Trim the ends from the souffl. For buffet service, slice three or four pieces from the souffl and place the remaining souffl on a platter. Nappe with Aurora sauce and garnish with the watercress and parsley.

fields.name: Coffee
fields.ingredient_amount: {'coffee-ground': ['ground coffee', '.5 lb', 'coffee-ground']}
fields.directions: Using preferred coffee maker and method, brew coffee. Let cool to lukewarm and either use immediately or place in refrigerator.

fields.name: Dirty Rice
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '2 oz', 'onion'], 'beef-chuck': ['beef chuck', '3 oz', 'beef-chuck'], 'paprika': ['paprikaas needed', '', 'paprika'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'salt': ['saltas needed', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '1 tbl', 'oil-vegetable'], 'cooked-long-grain-rice': ['Cooked Long-Grain Rice', '18 oz', 'cooked-long-grain-rice'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '4 tbl', 'onion-green'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '4 fl oz', 'chicken-stock'], 'chicken-liver': ['chicken liver', '3 oz', 'chicken-liver'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepperas needed', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '4 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepperas needed', '', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: 1 Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed saucepan until smoking. Add the livers and the pork or beef and saut until well browned. 2 Add the onion, garlic and spices and continue to cook and brown the mixture. Deglaze with a little stock and continue to cook until all the ingredients are well browned. 3 Add the remaining stock, the rice, green onions and parsley. Stir and cook until the rice is hot and then serve.

fields.name: Maltaise Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'orange-juice-fresh': ['Orange Juice (fresh)', '2 fl oz', 'orange-juice-fresh'], 'hollandaise': ['Hollandaise', '1 qt', 'hollandaise'], 'orange-zest': ['Orange Zest', '2 tsp', 'orange-zest']}
fields.directions: Add to hollandaise 2 fluid ounces (60 milliliters) orange juice and 2 teaspoons (10 milliliters) finely grated orange zest. Blood oranges are traditionally used for this sauce.

fields.name: Thai Melon Salsa
fields.ingredient_amount: {'thai-fish-sauce': ['thai fish sauce', '2 tbl', 'thai-fish-sauce'], 'cantaloupe': ['cantaloupe', '1 ea', 'cantaloupe'], 'pepper-serrano-chile': ['serrano chile pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-serrano-chile'], 'lime-juice-fresh': ['Lime Juice (fresh)', '2 fl oz', 'lime-juice-fresh'], 'mint-fresh': ['fresh mint', '4 tbl', 'mint-fresh'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tsp', 'garlic'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '2 tbl', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'melon-honeydew': ['honeydew melon', '1 ea', 'melon-honeydew'], 'peanuts-unsalted-roasted': ['unsalted roasted peanuts', '4 tbl', 'peanuts-unsalted-roasted']}
fields.directions: Cut the melons into small dice or shape into small balls using a parisienne scoop. Combine the remaining ingredients and toss with the melon pieces. Chill thoroughly. Serve with fish, shellfish or chicken.

fields.name: Cream Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'ba-chamel': ['BÃ©chamel', '1 qt', 'ba-chamel'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)as needed', '', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '10 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Add to bchamel 812 fluid ounces (240360 milliliters) scalded cream and a few drops of lemon juice.

fields.name: Eggplant Pure
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cumin-whole': ['whole cumin', '1 tsp', 'cumin-whole'], 'eggplant-japanese': ['Japanese eggplant', '4 ea', 'eggplant-japanese'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '4 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '2 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: 1 Cut the eggplants in half lengthwise and score the flesh with a paring knife. Toss with half of the oil. Season with salt and pepper and roast, cut side down, in a 300F (150C) oven until soft, approximately 20 to 30 minutes. Remove and cool. 2 Scrape the eggplant flesh from the skins and discard the skins. Mix the flesh with the remaining ingredients. Hold warm for service.

fields.name: Western Slope Cherry Glaze
fields.ingredient_amount: {'simple-syrup': ['Simple Syrup', '2 pt', 'simple-syrup'], 'oranges': ['oranges', '2 ea', 'oranges'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '2 pt', 'chicken-stock'], 'wine-port': ['port wine', '1 pt', 'wine-port'], 'cherries-dark': ['dark cherries', '2 lb', 'cherries-dark']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine the cherries and wine in a saucepot. Bring to a boil and reduce au sec. 2 Zest and juice the oranges. 3 Add the zest, juice, simple syrup and stock to the cherries and reduce to the consistency of a thin glaze.

fields.name: Chili Con Carne
fields.ingredient_amount: {'brown-stock': ['Brown Stock', '1 qt', 'brown-stock'], 'chili-powder': ['chili powder', '1 oz', 'chili-powder'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '4 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 oz', 'garlic'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '1/2 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'pepper-green-chile': ['green chile pepper', '8 oz', 'pepper-green-chile'], 'beef-ground': ['ground beef', '2, 8 lb', 'beef-ground'], 'onion': ['onion', '1 lb', 'onion'], 'tomatoes-canned': ['canned tomatoes', '3 lb', 'tomatoes-canned'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin', '2 tsp', 'cumin-ground'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'worcestershire-sauce': ['worcestershire sauce', '1 1/2 fl oz', 'worcestershire-sauce'], 'tomatoes-fresh': ['fresh tomatoes', '4 lb', 'tomatoes-fresh']}
fields.directions: Saut the onions in the oil until tender. Add the garlic and saut for 1 minute. Add the beef and brown, stirring occasionally. Drain off the excess fat. Add the remaining ingredients, bring to a simmer, cover and cook for 1 to 112 hours. Remove the bay leaves and adjust the seasonings.

fields.name: Mustard Vinaigrette Dressing
fields.ingredient_amount: {'oil-canola': ['canola oil', '6 fl oz', 'oil-canola'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 tbl', 'oil-olive'], 'mustard-dijon': ['Dijon mustard', '2 tbl', 'mustard-dijon'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'water': ['water', '2 tbl', 'water'], 'vinegar-red-wine': ['red wine vinegar', '2 fl oz', 'vinegar-red-wine'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine the mustard and vinegar in a blender. Season with salt and pepper. Add the oils. Blend a few seconds to emulsify. Add the hot water and blend until smooth.

fields.name: Nuoc Cham (Vietnamese Dipping Sauce)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'fish-sauce': ['fish sauce', '2 1/2 fl oz', 'fish-sauce'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 ea', 'shallot'], 'water': ['water', '1 1/2 fl oz', 'water'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '4 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '1 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'pepper-thai-chile': ['Thai chile pepper', '1 ea', 'pepper-thai-chile'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: . Whisk all the ingredients together in a small nonreactive bowl and allow to stand for at least 30 minutes at room temperature before serving.

fields.name: Soy Molasses Vinaigrette
fields.ingredient_amount: {'molasses': ['molasses', '4 fl oz', 'molasses'], 'vinegar-rice': ['rice vinegar', '2 fl oz', 'vinegar-rice'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '1 tsp', 'ginger-fresh'], 'soy-sauce': ['soy sauce', '8 fl oz', 'soy-sauce'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oilas needed', '', 'oil-olive']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine the molasses, rice vinegar, soy sauce and ginger in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and remove from the heat immediately. Allow the mixture to rest, undisturbed, for 1 hour. 2 Strain and chill the molasses mixture. Add the oil at service time.

fields.name: Piquant Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'vinegar-white-wine': ['white wine vinegar', '4 fl oz', 'vinegar-white-wine'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 qt', 'demi-glace'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1 oz', 'shallot'], 'chervil-fresh': ['fresh chervil', '1 tbl', 'chervil-fresh'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'tarragon-fresh': ['fresh tarragon', '1 tbl', 'tarragon-fresh'], 'cornichons': ['cornichons', '2 oz', 'cornichons']}
fields.directions: Combine 1 ounce (30 grams) shallots, 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) white wine and 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) white wine vinegar. Reduce the mixture by two-thirds. Then add demi-glace and simmer for 10 minutes. Add 2 ounces (60 grams) diced cornichons, 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) fresh tarragon, 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) fresh parsley and 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) fresh chervil. Do not strain. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Mousseline (Chantilly Sauce)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '8 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'hollandaise': ['Hollandaise', '1 qt', 'hollandaise']}
fields.directions: Whip 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) heavy cream until stiff. Fold it into the hollandaise just before service. Mousseline sauce is also used as a glaage coating.

fields.name: Acapulco Spice Blend
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose']}
fields.directions: Directions

fields.name: Brioche
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1 3/4 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '4, 7 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '24 ea', 'eggs'], 'water': ['water', '7 oz', 'water'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '3 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 3/4 oz', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '7 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Place the flour, eggs, salt and sugar into the bowl of a mixer fitted with a dough hook. Stir the ingredients together. Combine the yeast and water and add to the other ingredients. Knead approximately 20 minutes on medium speed. The dough will be smooth, shiny and moist. It should not form a ball. Slowly add the butter to the dough. Knead only until all the butter is incorporated. Remove the dough from the mixer and place it into a bowl dusted with flour. Cover and let the dough ferment at room temperature until doubled. Punch down the dough, cover tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight. Portion and shape the chilled dough as desired. Place the shaped dough in well-greased pans and proof at room temperature until doubled. Bake at 375F (190C) until the brioche is a dark golden brown and sounds hollow. Baking time will vary depending on the temperature of the dough and the size of the rolls or loaves being baked.

fields.name: Choron Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'ba-arnaise': ['BÃ©arnaise', '1 qt', 'ba-arnaise'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '2 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '2 fl oz', 'tomato-paste']}
fields.directions: Combine 2 ounces (60 grams) tomato paste and 2 fluid ounces (60 milliliters) heavy cream; add the mixture to a barnaise.

fields.name: Pink Peppercorn Beurre Blanc
fields.ingredient_amount: {'peppercorn-pink': ['pink peppercornas needed', '', 'peppercorn-pink'], 'beurre-rouge': ['Beurre Rouge', '1 qt', 'beurre-rouge']}
fields.directions: Add 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) coarsely crushed pink peppercorns to the shallot-wine reduction when making beurre rouge. Garnish the finished sauce with whole pink peppercorns.

fields.name: Basic Bran Muffins
fields.ingredient_amount: {'molasses': ['molasses', '3 oz', 'molasses'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '4 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '4 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'wheat-bran': ['wheat bran', '6 oz', 'wheat-bran'], 'honey': ['honey', '3 oz', 'honey'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '12 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'milk': ['milk', '12 fl oz', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '4 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine all ingredients using the muffin method. Allow the batter to rest at least 30 minutes or up to 36 hours in the refrigerator. Scoop into greased or paper-lined muffin tins. Bake at 350F (180C) until lightly brown and firm, approximately 20 minutes.

fields.name: Barley Risotto
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion-green': ['green onion', '3 tbl', 'onion-green'], 'barley': ['barley', '4 oz', 'barley'], 'salt-kosher': ['kosher salt to taste', '', 'salt-kosher'], 'water': ['water', '1 pt', 'water'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 tbl', 'butter'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '4 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'cheese-asiago': ['asiago cheese', '1 oz', 'cheese-asiago'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '8 fl oz', 'chicken-stock']}
fields.directions: 1 Cook the barley in the water until barely done; strain. 2 Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, approximately 2 minutes. Add the barley and, stirring with a wooden spoon, completely coat the barley with the butter. 3 Increase the heat and add 4 fluid ounces (125 milliliters) stock. Stir until all the stock is ab-sorbed, then add the remaining stock. Cook until almost all the stock is absorbed and remove from heat. 4 Stir in the green onions and cheese, and season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Mealy Pie Dough
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-granulated'], 'flour-pastry': ['pastry flour', '1, 6 lb', 'flour-pastry'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '4 fl oz', 'buttermilk'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tbl', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: Cut butter into medium dice 38 inch (9 millimeters) square. Sift the flour onto a work surface or into a large bowl. Cut the butter into the flour mixture until it resembles coarse corn meal. Combine the buttermilk, salt, sugar and vanilla (if using) in a bowl with a whisk. Gradually add the buttermilk to the flour mixture. Mix gently until the dough holds together. Do not overmix or add too much liquid. Cover the dough with plastic wrap and chill thoroughly before using.

fields.name: Greek-Style Scrambled Eggs
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cheese-feta': ['feta cheese', '4 oz', 'cheese-feta'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '2 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'onion': ['onion', '2 oz', 'onion'], 'olives-greek-pitted': ['Greek pitted olives', '3 tbl', 'olives-greek-pitted'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '12 ea', 'eggs'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'spinach-fresh': ['fresh spinach', '2 oz', 'spinach-fresh'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '3 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Combine the eggs, cream, salt and pepper in a mixing bowl. Whisk until well blended. Saut the onion in the butter until translucent but not brown. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook, stirring frequently, until half cooked, approxi-mately 1 minute. Add the spinach to the eggs and continue cooking. Just before the eggs are fully cooked, sprinkle on the feta. Spoon the cooked egg mixture onto serving plates and garnish with the olives. Serve imme-diately.

fields.name: Creole Spice Mix
fields.ingredient_amount: {'salt-kosher': ['kosher salt', '8 oz', 'salt-kosher'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '2 1/2 oz', 'paprika'], 'thyme-dried-ground': ['dried ground thyme', '1/2 oz', 'thyme-dried-ground'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '2 oz', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic-granulated': ['granulated garlic', '2 oz', 'garlic-granulated'], 'oregano-dried-ground': ['dried ground oregano', '1/2 oz', 'oregano-dried-ground'], 'onion-granulated': ['granulated onion', '1 1/4 oz', 'onion-granulated'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/2 oz', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine all of the ingredients for the Creole spice mix and stir together.

fields.name: Poivrade Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '4 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 tbl', 'oil-olive'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'vinegar-wine': ['wine vinegar', '16 fl oz', 'vinegar-wine'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '12 oz', 'mirepoix'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 qt', 'demi-glace'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 sprig', 'thyme-fresh'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '20 ea', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter']}
fields.directions: Sweat 12 ounces (360 grams) mirepoix in 2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) oil. Add 1 bay leaf, 1 sprig thyme and 4 parsley stems. Then add 16 fluid ounces (480 milliliters) vinegar and 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) white wine. Reduce by half, add demi-glace and simmer for 40 minutes. Then add 20 crushed peppercorns and simmer for 5 more minutes. Strain through a fine chinois and finish with up to 2 ounces (60 grams) whole butter. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Swiss Steak
fields.ingredient_amount: {'celery': ['celery', '8 oz', 'celery'], 'brown-stock': ['Brown Stock', '5 pt', 'brown-stock'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '3 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'tomato-pura-e': ['tomato purÃ©e', '6 oz', 'tomato-pura-e'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'onion': ['onion', '1 lb', 'onion'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'beef-bottom-round-steaks-6-oz': ['Beef Bottom Round Steaks (6 oz)', '10 ea', 'beef-bottom-round-steaks-6-oz'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '8 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '4 oz', 'flour-all-purpose']}
fields.directions: Dredge the steaks in flour seasoned with salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a roasting pan and brown the steaks well on both sides. Remove the steaks. Add the onions, garlic and celery; saut until tender. Add the flour and cook to a brown roux. Gradually add the stock, whisking until the sauce is thickened and smooth. Add the tomato pure and sachet. Return the steaks to the braising pan, cover and cook in a 300F (150C) oven until tender, approximately 2 hours. Remove the steaks from the sauce. Discard the sachet. Strain the sauce and adjust the season-ings. Serve the steaks with the sauce.

fields.name: Beef Bourguignonne
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-chuck': ['beef chuck', '4 lb', 'beef-chuck'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 1/2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '1 lb', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '3 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'wine-dry-red': ['dry red wine', '26 fl oz', 'wine-dry-red'], 'onion-pearl': ['pearl onion', '30 ea', 'onion-pearl'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '1 ea', 'carrot'], 'onion': ['onion', '3 ea', 'onion'], 'brown-stock': ['Brown Stock', '1 pt', 'brown-stock'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '1 tbl', 'tomato-paste'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 sprig', 'thyme-fresh'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '10 ea', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '10 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '2 tbl', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'leeks': ['leeks', '1 ea', 'leeks'], 'tomatoes-fresh': ['fresh tomatoes', '4 ea', 'tomatoes-fresh']}
fields.directions: Combine the garlic, onions, carrots, parsley, bouquet garni, peppercorns, salt and wine to make a marinade. Marinate the meat for several hours under refrigeration. Remove and drain the meat. Reserve the marinade. Dry the beef and saut it in the oil in a large rondeau until well browned. Do this in several batches if necessary. Return all the meat to the rondeau. Sprinkle with flour and cook to make a blond roux. Stir in the tomato paste and cook for 5 minutes. Add the reserved marinade, tomatoes and stock. Cook in a 350F (180C) oven until the meat is tender, approximately 212 hours. Remove the meat from the sauce. Strain the sauce through a china cap, pressing to extract all the liquid. Discard the solids. Return the liquid and the beef to the pot. Saut the mushrooms in the butter and add them to the meat and sauce. Add the pearl onions and adjust the seasonings. Simmer for 10 minutes to blend the flavors.

fields.name: Pecan Sticky Buns
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lemon-zest': ['Lemon Zest', '1 tbl', 'lemon-zest'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '3 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1 tsp', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tsp', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '4 oz', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'milk': ['milk', '1 tbl', 'milk'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '5 1/2 fl oz', 'buttermilk'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'pecan-halves': ['pecan halves', '3 oz', 'pecan-halves'], 'honey': ['honey', '3 fl oz', 'honey'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '2 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: To make the dough, stir the yeast, sugar and milk together in a small bowl. Set aside. Stir the buttermilk, salt, vanilla extract, lemon zest and lemon juice together and add to the yeast mixture. Add the egg yolks, flour and softened butter to the liquid mixture. Knead until the butter is evenly distributed and the dough is smooth and fully developed, approximately 6 minutes. Cover and ferment until doubled. Prepare the topping and filling mixtures while the dough is fermenting. To make the topping, cream the honey and sugar together. Stir in the pecans. This mixture will be very stiff. To make the filling, stir the cinnamon, pecans and sugar together. Lightly grease muffin cups, then distribute the topping mixture evenly, about 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) per muffin cup. Set the pans aside at room temperature until the dough is ready. Punch down the dough and let it rest 10 minutes. Roll out the dough into a rectangle about 1/2 inch (1.2 centimeters) thick. Brush with melted butter and top evenly with the filling mixture. Starting with either long edge, roll up the dough. Cut into slices about 3/4 to 1 inch (1.8 to 2.5 centimeters) thick. Place a slice in each muffin cup over the topping. Let the buns proof until doubled, approximately 20 minutes. Bake at 325F (160C) until very brown, approximately 25 minutes. Immediately invert the muffin pans onto paper-lined sheet pans to let the buns and their topping slide out.

fields.name: Fresh Pasta Sheets
fields.ingredient_amount: {'basic-pasta-dough': ['Basic Pasta Dough', '2 lb', 'basic-pasta-dough']}
fields.directions: Directions:

fields.name: Posole
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chicken-whole-2-a-3-a-lb': ['whole 2 Â½ - 3 Â½ lb chicken', '1 ea', 'chicken-whole-2-a-3-a-lb'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oilas needed', '', 'oil-olive'], 'chili-powder': ['chili powder', '2 tbl', 'chili-powder'], 'hominy-canned': ['canned hominy', '3 1/2 lb', 'hominy-canned'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 1/2 tbl', 'garlic'], 'tortilla-corn': ['corn tortilla', '6 ea', 'tortilla-corn'], 'lettuce-romaine': ['romaine lettuce', '8 oz', 'lettuce-romaine'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'tomatoes-canned': ['canned tomatoes', '8 oz', 'tomatoes-canned'], 'pork-shoulder': ['pork shoulder', '3 lb', 'pork-shoulder'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'oregano-fresh': ['fresh oregano', '1 1/2 tsp', 'oregano-fresh'], 'onion': ['onion', '8 oz', 'onion'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oilas needed', '', 'oil-vegetable'], 'vinegar-cider': ['cider vinegar', '2 tbl', 'vinegar-cider'], 'pepper-anaheim-chile': ['anaheim chile pepper', '4 oz', 'pepper-anaheim-chile'], 'lime': ['lime', '2 ea', 'lime'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '1/2 oz', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Trim the fat from the pork shoulder and cut the meat into medium dice. Place the meat in a heavy saucepot with the stock. Add more stock if necessary to just cover the meat. Bring to a simmer. Skim the scum from the surface. Drain the hominy and soak it in cold water until needed. After the pork has simmered for 2 minutes, add one-third of the onions, half of the garlic, and the oregano, salt, black pepper and cayenne pepper. Simmer for 1 hour. Bone and skin the chicken. Cut the meat into medium dice and refrigerate until needed. Sweat the remaining two-thirds of the onions in a saut pan in a little oil until soft. Add the remaining garlic and cook an additional 2 minutes. Add the raw chicken and cook until it loses its raw look. Mix in the chilli powder, tomatoes, Anaheim chiles and drained hominy. Cook until the flavors have blended. Add the mixture to the pork in the saucepot. Simmer until the chicken is cooked. Add the cilantro. Adjust the consistency of the posole with chicken stock, if necessary. For service, cut the limes into wedges. Cut the tortillas in half, then cut them crosswise into thin strips and fry them in hot oil until crisp. Toss the romaine lettuce with the cider vinegar. Garnish each bowl with romaine lettuce, diced onions, fried tortilla strips and a lime wedge.

fields.name: Frangelico Custard Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '8 oz', 'egg-yolks'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '10 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'cream-half-half': ['half & half cream', '1 qt', 'cream-half-half'], 'frangelico': ['frangelico', '1.5 fl oz', 'frangelico'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '0.08 fl oz', 'vanilla-extract']}
fields.directions: MISE EN PLACE  Split vanilla bean in half.  Set up an ice bath.  In a heavy nonreactive saucepan, bring the half-and-half and vanilla bean just to a boil.  Whisk the egg yolks and sugar together in a mixing bowl. Temper the egg mixture with approximately one-third of the hot half-and-half, then return the entire mixture to the saucepan with the remaining half-and-half.  Cook the sauce over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it is thick enough to lightly coat the back of a spoon. Do not allow the mixture to go above 185F (85C) or the mixture will curdle. Do not allow the sauce to boil.  As soon as the sauce thickens, remove it from the heat and pour it through a fine mesh strainer into a clean bowl. Chill the sauce over an ice bath, then cover and keep refrigerated. The sauce should last 3 to 4 days VARIATIONS: Frangelico Custard SauceOmit the vanilla bean. Stir in 0.08 fluid ounce (2.5 milliliters/1/2 teaspoon) vanilla extract and 1 to 1.5 fluid ounces (30 to 45 milliliters) Frangelico,  to taste.
