fields.name: Sauted Veal Scallops with White Wine Lemon Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'brown-veal-stock': ['Brown Veal Stock', '4 fl oz', 'brown-veal-stock'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '6 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'lemon': ['lemon', '12 wedge', 'lemon'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 tbl', 'shallot'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '2 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '4 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'veal-scallops-3-oz': ['Veal Scallops (3 oz)', '12 ea', 'veal-scallops-3-oz'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '4 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Pound the scallops to a uniform thickness, as described in Chapter 14, Veal. Heat a saut pan and add enough clarified butter to coat the bottom of the pan. Dredge the scallops in flour seasoned with salt and pepper and add to the pan in a single layer. Saut on each side for 1 to 2 minutes. As the first scallops are done, remove them to a warm platter and saut the remaining scallops. This can be done in several batches, adding additional clarified butter as needed. Add the chopped shallots to the pan and saut. Deglaze the pan with the wine and lemon juice. Add the stock and reduce by half. Swirl in the butter (mont au beurre). Adjust the seasonings with salt and pepper. Serve two scallops per person with approximately 1 ounce (30 milliliters) sauce. Garnish with lemon wedges.

fields.name: Apple Salsa
fields.ingredient_amount: {'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'lime-zest': ['Lime Zest', '1 tsp', 'lime-zest'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '6 ea', 'onion-green'], 'pepper-jalapeno-chile': ['jalapeno chile pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-jalapeno-chile'], 'water': ['water', '2 fl oz', 'water'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'cranberry-sauce-canned': ['canned cranberry sauce', '8 oz', 'cranberry-sauce-canned'], 'orange-zest': ['Orange Zest', '1 tsp', 'orange-zest'], 'apple-granny-smith': ['granny smith apple', '4 ea', 'apple-granny-smith'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '4 tbl', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'lemon-zest': ['Lemon Zest', '1 tsp', 'lemon-zest']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine the ingredients and chill.

fields.name: Entrectes (14 oz)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-ribeye': ['beef ribeye', '1 ea', 'beef-ribeye']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim meat of all excess fat and sliverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut ribeye into 14 oz steaks. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator

fields.name: Simmered Rice
fields.ingredient_amount: {'rice-white': ['white rice', '8 oz', 'rice-white'], 'water': ['water', '1 pt', 'water'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Bring the water and salt to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Slowly add the rice. Cover the pan and reduce the heat so that the liquid simmers gently. Cook until the rice is tender and the water is absorbed, approximately 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from the heat and transfer to a hotel pan. Do not cover. Allow any excess moisture to evaporate for approximately 5 minutes. Fluff the rice and serve, or refrigerate for use in another recipe.

fields.name: Sauted Veal Scallops with Calvados
fields.ingredient_amount: {'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'veal-scallops-6-oz': ['Veal Scallops (6 oz)', '6 ea', 'veal-scallops-6-oz'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 ea', 'shallot'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '12 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'cra-me-fraa-che': ['crÃ¨me fraÃ®che', '8 fl oz', 'cra-me-fraa-che'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1 tbl', 'parsley-fresh'], 'apple-golden-delicious': ['golden delicious apple', '3 ea', 'apple-golden-delicious'], 'calvados': ['calvados', '2 fl oz', 'calvados'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '4 fl oz', 'clarified-butter']}
fields.directions: Saut the mushrooms in a portion of the clarified butter until dry. Remove and reserve. Peel and core the apples. Cut each into 12 wedges. Saut the apple wedges in a portion of the clarified butter until slightly browned and tender. Remove and reserve. Season the veal scallops with salt and pepper. Saut in the remaining clarified butter. (This may be done in two or three batches.) Remove and reserve. Add the shallots to the pan and saut without browning. Deglaze with the Calvados. Flamb the Calvados. Add the sauted mushrooms and crme frache. Bring to a boil and reduce until it thickens slightly. Return the scallops to the pan to reheat. Serve each scallop with sauce, garnished with six apple slices and chopped parsley.

fields.name: Horseradish Cream Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 qt', 'cream-heavy'], 'horseradish-fresh': ['fresh horseradish', '4 tbl', 'horseradish-fresh'], 'butter': ['butter', '1/2 tsp', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '4 tbl', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Combine the cream, salt and white pepper in a saucepan. Heat over medium heat. Do not al-low the cream to boil. Rub the butter and flour together to form small balls (beurre mani). Add the beurre mani to the simmering cream. Cook until the sauce is smooth, then add the horseradish. Serve warm.

fields.name: Carpaccio
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-tenderloin': ['beef tenderloin', '1 lb', 'beef-tenderloin'], 'capers': ['capers', '4 tsp', 'capers'], 'pepper-cracked-black': ['cracked black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-cracked-black'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 1/2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'mustard-dijon': ['Dijon mustard', '1 tbl', 'mustard-dijon'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'onion': ['onion', '4 oz', 'onion'], 'mayonnaise': ['mayonnaise', '8 oz', 'mayonnaise']}
fields.directions: Place the tenderloin in the freezer until nearly frozen. Combine the mayonnaise with the mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Slice the nearly frozen tenderloin on an electric slicer very thin, almost transparent. On eight very cold plates, arrange one slightly overlapping layer of thin slices of beef. Sprinkle each plate of beef with 12 teaspoon (2.5 milliliters) capers, a generous amount of cracked black pepper, salt and 12 ounce (15 grams) sliced onions. Drizzle with 1 teaspoon (5 milliliters) oil and spoon 12 ounce (15 grams) mayonnaise in the center of each plate. Serve very cold.

fields.name: Cajun Spice Mix
fields.ingredient_amount: {'garlic-powder': ['garlic powder', '1 oz', 'garlic-powder'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '1 oz', 'paprika'], 'onion-powder': ['onion powder', '1 oz', 'onion-powder'], 'thyme-dried-ground': ['dried ground thyme', '1/3 oz', 'thyme-dried-ground'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/2 oz', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'oregano-dried-ground': ['dried ground oregano', '1/3 oz', 'oregano-dried-ground'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 oz', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '1/2 oz', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '1/4 oz', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine all ingredients and mix well.

fields.name: Pure of Split Pea Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'bacon': ['bacon', '3 oz', 'bacon'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '2 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'croutons': ['Croutonsas needed', '', 'croutons'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '1 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '3 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'ham-hocks': ['ham hocks', '1 1/2 lb', 'ham-hocks'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'peas-green-split': ['green split peas', '1 lb', 'peas-green-split'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole']}
fields.directions: In a stockpot, render the bacon by cooking it slowly and allowing it to release its fat; sweat the mirepoix and garlic in the fat without browning them. Add the stock, peas, ham hocks or bones and sachet. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer and cook until the peas are soft, approximately 1 to 112 hours. Remove the sachet and ham hocks or bones. Pass the soup through a food mill and return it to the stockpot. Remove the meat from the hocks or bones. Cut the meat into medium dice and add it to the soup. Bring the soup to a simmer and, if necessary, adjust the consistency by adding hot chicken stock. Adjust the seasonings and serve, garnished with croutons. VARIATIONS: White beans, yellow peas and other dried beans can be soaked overnight in water and used in-stead of split peas.

fields.name: Diplomat Cream Filling
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['water', '6 fl oz', 'water'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 qt', 'cream-heavy'], 'framboise': ['framboise', '4 fl oz', 'framboise'], 'gelatin-powdered': ['powdered gelatin', '1 1/2 oz', 'gelatin-powdered'], 'pastry-cream-cra-me-pa-tissia-re': ['Pastry Cream (CrÃ¨me PÃ¢tissiÃ¨re)', '1 gal', 'pastry-cream-cra-me-pa-tissia-re']}
fields.directions: 1 Place the pastry cream in a large mixer bowl and whip on high speed until smooth. Add the raspberry liqueur. 2 Bloom the granulated gelatin in the water, then place over a low flame and heat to dissolve. 3 Add 1 pint (450 milliliters) of the raspberry-flavored Pastry Cream to the gelatin. Place over a low flame and whip by hand until smooth and the gelatin is incorporated. Add this mixture to the rest of the Pastry Cream. 4 Fold in the whipped cream.

fields.name: Bercy Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'wine-dry-white': ['dry white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-dry-white'], 'fish-stock': ['Fish Stock', '8 fl oz', 'fish-stock'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 oz', 'shallot'], 'butter': ['butteras needed', '', 'butter'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsleyas needed', '', 'parsley-fresh'], 'fish-velouta': ['Fish VeloutÃ©', '1 qt', 'fish-velouta'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Saut 2 ounces (60 grams) finely diced shallots in butter. Then add 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) dry white wine and 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) fish stock. Reduce this mixture by one-third and add the fish velout. Finish with butter and garnish with chopped parsley. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Beef Stew Meat
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-chuck': ['beef chuck', '1 ea', 'beef-chuck']}
fields.directions: ) Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim meat of all excess fat and sliverskin. Cut chuck into cubes of desired size, making sure they are uniform Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Chorizo
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pork-lean': ['lean pork', '5 lb', 'pork-lean'], 'pepper-crushed-red': ['crushed red pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-crushed-red'], 'fatback': ['fatback', '2, 8 lb', 'fatback'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '5 tbl', 'paprika'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin', '3 tbl', 'cumin-ground'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 oz', 'garlic'], 'vinegar-red-wine': ['red wine vinegar', '3 fl oz', 'vinegar-red-wine'], 'salt': ['salt', '4 tsp', 'salt'], 'pepper-cayenne': ['cayenne pepper', '2 tbl', 'pepper-cayenne']}
fields.directions: Cut the pork and fatback in 1-inch (2.5-centimeter) pieces. Grind the pork once using a medium die. Grind half of the pork a second time together with the fatback through a fine die. Combine all the ingredients in the bowl of a mixer fitted with a paddle. The sausage may be used in bulk or formed into links as desired.

fields.name: Tomato Butter Sauce with Thyme
fields.ingredient_amount: {'wine-white': ['white wine', '2 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 tbl', 'shallot'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'plum-tomato-concassa': ['Plum Tomato ConcassÃ©', '2 1/2 lb', 'plum-tomato-concassa'], 'salt': ['salt', '3/4 tsp', 'salt'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '2 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'vinegar-white-wine': ['white wine vinegar', '2 fl oz', 'vinegar-white-wine'], 'vermouth-dry': ['dry vermouth', '2 fl oz', 'vermouth-dry'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 tbl', 'thyme-fresh'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '1 1/2 tsp', 'parsley-fresh'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '4 oz', 'butter']}
fields.directions: Saut the tomato concasse in the oil for approximately 2 minutes. Lower the heat to a simmer and reduce the tomato until thick but not dry. In a saucepan, combine the wine, vermouth, vinegar and shallot. Bring to a boil and reduce au sec. Add the cream and reduce by half. Add the thyme, salt and pepper to the tomatoes. Stir in the wine, cream and shallot reduction. Bring the sauce to a simmer. Add the butter pieces and stir until incorporated. Do not allow the sauce to boil or the butter will separate. Adjust the seasonings and stir in the parsley.

fields.name: Sweet Potato Biscuits
fields.ingredient_amount: {'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '4 tbl', 'baking-powder'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1 tbl', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '1 qt', 'buttermilk'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'milk': ['milk', '4 fl oz', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '4 1/2 tsp', 'salt'], 'potato-sweet': ['sweet potato', '4 lb', 'potato-sweet'], 'allspice-ground': ['ground allspice', '1/4 tsp', 'allspice-ground'], 'cloves-ground': ['ground cloves', '1/2 tsp', 'cloves-ground'], 'flour-bread': ['bread flour', '20 oz', 'flour-bread'], 'nutmeg-ground': ['ground nutmeg', '1 tsp', 'nutmeg-ground'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'honey': ['honey', '1 oz', 'honey'], 'shortening-vegetable': ['vegetable shortening', '8 oz', 'shortening-vegetable'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'flour-cake': ['cake flour', '13 oz', 'flour-cake']}
fields.directions: Peel the sweet potatoes and cut into large pieces. Steam until tender, mash or pass through a food mill and spread onto a parchment-lined sheet pan. Cool completely. In a mixing bowl, sift together the flours, salt and baking powder. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients until the mixture resembles coarse meal. In a separate mixing bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves and allspice. Work the sweet potato mixture into the flour mixture until combined. Add 28 fluid ounces (840 milliliters) buttermilk. Mix to form a soft dough. The consistency will depend on the moisture content of the sweet potatoes. Add the remaining buttermilk if necessary. Allow the dough to rest for 5 minutes. Dust the work surface with high-gluten flour. Roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/2 inch (1.2 centimeters). Cut to the desired size with a floured cutter and place on a paper-lined sheet pan. Make an egg wash with the eggs and milk and brush the tops of the biscuits. Bake at 400F (200C) for 12 to 15 minutes. Combine the softened butter and the honey. Remove the biscuits from the oven when done and immediately brush with the honey butter.

fields.name: Hearty Vegetable Beef Soup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'turnips-white': ['white turnips', '8 oz', 'turnips-white'], 'tomato-concassa': ['Tomato ConcassÃ©', '12 oz', 'tomato-concassa'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '2 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'corn-kernels-frozen': ['frozen corn kernels', '12 oz', 'corn-kernels-frozen'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'beef-broth': ['Beef Broth', '4 qt', 'beef-broth'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '3 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'beef-stew-meat': ['Beef Stew Meat', '1 lb', 'beef-stew-meat'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '8 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'butter': ['butter', '6 oz', 'butter'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole']}
fields.directions: In a soup pot, sweat the mirepoix and turnip in the butter or fat until tender. Add the garlic and saut lightly. Add the broth or stock and the diced beef; bring to a simmer. Add the sachet. Skim or de-grease as necessary. Simmer until the beef and vegetables are tender, approximately 1 hour. Add the tomato concasse and corn; simmer for 10 minutes. Season  to taste with salt and pepper. Cool and refrigerate or hold for service. VARIATIONS: A wide variety of vegetables can be added or substituted in this recipe. If leeks, rutabagas, pars-nips or cabbage are used, they should be sweated to bring out their flavors before the liquid is added. Potatoes, fresh beans, summer squash and other vegetables that cook more quickly should be added according to their cooking times. Seasonal leafy greens such as turnip tops, dandelion greens or arugula can be shredded and stirred in near the end of cooking. Rice, barley and pasta garnishes should be cooked separately and added just before service.

fields.name: Baked Apples
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '4 oz', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'raisins-dark': ['dark raisins', '6 oz', 'raisins-dark'], 'apple-golden-delicious': ['golden delicious apple', '8 ea', 'apple-golden-delicious'], 'orange-zest': ['Orange Zest', '1 1/2 tbl', 'orange-zest']}
fields.directions: Rinse and core each apple. The peels should be scored or partially removed to allow the pulp to expand without bursting the skin during baking. Plump the raisins by soaking them in boiling water for 10 minutes. Drain the raisins thor-oughly. Combine the raisins, zest and sugar. Fill the cavity of each apple with this mixture. Stand the apples in a shallow baking dish. Add enough water to measure about 12 inch (1.2 centimeters) deep. Bake the apples at 375F (190C) for 15 minutes. Reduce the temperature to 300F (150C) and continue baking until the apples are tender but still hold their shape, approximately 1 hour. Occasionally, baste the apples with liquid from the baking dish.

fields.name: Hush Puppies (Deep-Fried Cornbread)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '8 oz', 'onion'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '1 tbl', 'baking-powder'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '4 ea', 'eggs'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tbl', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '8 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'milk': ['milk', '1 pt', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tbl', 'salt'], 'cornmeal-yellow': ['yellow cornmeal', '1 lb', 'cornmeal-yellow'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '2 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine all ingredients using the muffin method. Drop small scoops (using a #60 or #70 portion scoop) into deep fat at 375F (190C). Using the swimming method, deep-fry until golden brown. Remove from the fat and drain. Serve immediately.

fields.name: Bouquet Garni
fields.ingredient_amount: {'carrot': ['carrot', '1 ea', 'carrot'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'leeks': ['leeks', '1 ea', 'leeks'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 sprig', 'thyme-fresh'], 'parsley-fresh-italian': ['fresh Italian parsley', '4 sprig', 'parsley-fresh-italian']}
fields.directions: Wash all items. Split carrot and separate leek leaves. Using butcher twine - tie everything into bundle.

fields.name: Streusel Topping
fields.ingredient_amount: {'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '2 tsp', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'butter': ['butter', '1, 8 lb', 'butter'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '11 oz', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '2 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'salt': ['salt', '2 tsp', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine the dry ingredients. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse and crumbly. Sprinkle on top of muffins or quick breads before baking. Streusel topping will keep for sev-eral weeks under refrigeration and may be frozen for longer storage. There is no need to thaw before use.

fields.name: Beer Beurre Blanc Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '4 ea', 'shallot'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '1 sprig', 'thyme-fresh'], 'vinegar-white-wine': ['white wine vinegar', '3 fl oz', 'vinegar-white-wine'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'beer': ['beer', '10 fl oz', 'beer'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1 1/2 lb', 'butter-unsalted']}
fields.directions: 1 Sweat the shallots in the 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) butter over medium heat for approxi-mately 2 minutes. Add the salt and pepper, vinegar, bay leaf, thyme and beer. 2 Reduce by two-thirds. 3 Whisk in the cold butter in pieces, moving the pan on and off the heat as necessary. Do not allow the sauce to boil. Adjust the seasonings, strain and hold in a bain marie for up to 2 hours. Serve with fried or grilled meat or poultry.

fields.name: Blond Roux
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butter', '1 lb', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1 lb', 'flour-all-purpose']}
fields.directions: Blond roux is cooked slightly longer than white roux and should begin to take on a little color as the flour caramelizes. It is used in ivory-colored sauces, such as velout, or where a richer flavor is desired.

fields.name: Brown Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'tomato-paste': ['tomato paste', '8 oz', 'tomato-paste'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '12 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '3 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'beef-bones': ['beef bones', '15 lb', 'beef-bones']}
fields.directions: Place the bones in a roasting pan, one layer deep, and brown in a 375F (190C) oven. Turn the bones occasionally to brown them evenly. Remove the bones and place them in a stockpot. Pour off the fat from the roasting pan and reserve it. Deglaze the roasting pan with part of the cold water. Add the deglazing liquor and the rest of the cold water to the bones, covering them completely. Bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Add a portion of the reserved fat to the roasting pan and saut the mirepoix until evenly browned. Then add it to the simmering stock. Add the tomato paste and sachet to the stock and continue to simmer for 6 to 8 hours, skim-ming as necessary. Strain, cool and refrigerate. Note: can use Veal Bones

fields.name: Southeast Asian Consomm with Lemongrass
fields.ingredient_amount: {'lemongrass': ['lemongrass', '3 tbl', 'lemongrass'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/4 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '4 oz', 'carrot'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '1 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'mint-fresh': ['fresh mint', '1 tbl', 'mint-fresh'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '4 ea', 'parsley-fresh'], 'star-anise-whole': ['whole star anise', '2 ea', 'star-anise-whole'], 'pepper-thai-chile': ['Thai chile pepper', '2 ea', 'pepper-thai-chile'], 'basil-fresh': ['fresh basil', '2 tbl', 'basil-fresh'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '6 ea', 'egg-whites'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'lime-zest': ['Lime Zest', '2 tsp', 'lime-zest'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '2 tbl', 'ginger-fresh'], 'lime-juice-fresh': ['Lime Juice (fresh)', '1 tbl', 'lime-juice-fresh'], 'peas-snow': ['snow peas', '4 oz', 'peas-snow'], 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless': ['boneless skinless chicken breast', '1 lb', 'chicken-breast-boneless-skinless'], 'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '8 oz', 'mirepoix'], 'mushrooms-shiitake': ['shiitake mushrooms', '2 oz', 'mushrooms-shiitake'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '2 1/2 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'noodles-rice': ['rice noodles', '8 oz', 'noodles-rice'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/4 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'soy-sauce': ['soy sauce to taste', '', 'soy-sauce'], 'cilantro-fresh': ['fresh cilantro', '3 tbl', 'cilantro-fresh'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar to taste', '', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Whip the egg whites until slightly frothy. Combine the egg whites, ground meat, mirepoix and lime juice in an appropriate stockpot and stir well. Add the cold stock, mix well and add the sachet. Bring the mixture to a simmer over moderate heat, stirring occasionally. Break a hole in the center of the raft and allow the consomm to bubble through. Simmer un-til full flavor develops, approximately 112 hours. Strain the consomm through several layers of damp cheesecloth or a coffee filter, degrease and adjust the seasonings with soy sauce, salt, white pepper and sugar  to taste. Rehydrate the rice noodles in hot water, cool in an ice bath, drain and hold for service. Pull the strings from the snow peas, cut them on the bias, blanch, chill in an ice bath, drain and hold them for service. Blanch the carrots, chill in an ice bath and hold them for service. For each serving, heat a small portion of noodles, snow peas, carrots and mushroom caps by immersing them in boiling water for a few seconds, then place them in soup bowls. Ladle the hot consomm over the vegetables and add fresh herbs  to taste.

fields.name: Tarragon Aoli
fields.ingredient_amount: {'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '8 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '1 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 tbl', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '1 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'vinegar-champagne': ['Champagne vinegar', '1 tsp', 'vinegar-champagne'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'tarragon-fresh': ['fresh tarragon', '2 tsp', 'tarragon-fresh']}
fields.directions: 1 Whisk the yolk and   teaspoon (3 milliliters) lemon juice together until smooth. 2 Whisk in the oil, very slowly at first, until the aoli begins to emulsify. Add a few drops of lemon juice as necessary to thin the sauce. Continue until all the oil and lemon juice have been incorporated. 3 Season with the garlic, vinegar, tarragon and salt. If the aoli is too thick, thin it with a little warm water.

fields.name: White Wine Marinade
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '5 oz', 'onion'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '24 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-ground-white'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 tsp', 'garlic'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'lemon-juice-fresh': ['Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1 fl oz', 'lemon-juice-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tbl', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '4 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable']}
fields.directions: Combine all ingredients. Use approximately 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) marinade for each double breast of chicken.

fields.name: Pt Spice
fields.ingredient_amount: {'basil-dried-ground': ['dried ground basil', '2/3 oz', 'basil-dried-ground'], 'cloves-ground': ['ground cloves', '1 oz', 'cloves-ground'], 'paprika': ['paprika', '1 oz', 'paprika'], 'nutmeg-ground': ['ground nutmeg', '1 oz', 'nutmeg-ground'], 'thyme-dried-ground': ['dried ground thyme', '1 oz', 'thyme-dried-ground'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '2/3 oz', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'bay-leaves-dried-ground': ['dried ground bay leaves', '1/3 oz', 'bay-leaves-dried-ground'], 'marjoram-ground': ['ground marjoram', '1/3 oz', 'marjoram-ground'], 'ginger-ground': ['ground ginger', '1 oz', 'ginger-ground'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper', '2/3 oz', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Grind all the ingredients in a spice grinder. Pass through a sieve to remove any large pieces. VARIATION: This mixture can be used as is, or mix 1 ounce (30 grams) (or any amount desired) with 1 pound (480 grams) salt. The salt-and-spice mixture can then be used to season forcemeats; 1/3 ounce (10 grams) per pound of forcemeat usually suffices for most pts.

fields.name: Almond Cream
fields.ingredient_amount: {'almonds-ground': ['ground almonds', '12 oz', 'almonds-ground'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '8 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 lb', 'sugar-granulated'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '5 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '5 ea', 'eggs']}
fields.directions: Cream the butter and sugar. Slowly add the eggs, scraping down the bowl as necessary. Stir the flour and almonds together, then add to the butter mixture. Blend until no lumps re-main. Almond cream may be stored under refrigeration for up to 3 weeks.

fields.name: Eggplant and Sun-Dried Tomato Pizza
fields.ingredient_amount: {'eggplant-japanese': ['Japanese eggplant', '2 ea', 'eggplant-japanese'], 'tomatoes-sun-dried': ['sun-dried tomatoes', '5 ea', 'tomatoes-sun-dried'], 'oil-extra-virgin-olive': ['extra virgin olive oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-extra-virgin-olive'], 'cheese-provolone': ['provolone cheese', '4 oz', 'cheese-provolone'], 'cheese-parmesan': ['parmesan cheese', '1/2 oz', 'cheese-parmesan'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 tsp', 'garlic'], 'pizza-dough': ['Pizza Dough', '1 lb', 'pizza-dough'], 'cheese-mozzarella': ['mozzarella cheese', '2 oz', 'cheese-mozzarella'], 'basil-fresh': ['fresh basil', '12 leaf', 'basil-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Slice the eggplants diagonally into 1/2-inch (1.2-centimeter) slices. Toss the eggplants with 1 fluid ounce (30 grams) olive oil and the garlic; season with salt and pepper. Place the eggplant slices on a baking sheet and roast at 375F (190C) until soft in the center, approximately 15 to 20 minutes. Cool and slice into strips. Preheat the oven to 500F (260C). Roll out the dough and place it on a lightly oiled pizza pan or well-floured wooden peel; brush it lightly with the remaining oil. Lay the eggplant and sun-dried tomatoes on top. Toss the Provolone and mozzarella together and sprinkle on the pizza. Bake the pizza until the crust is golden and crisp, approximately 8 to 12 minutes. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with the Parmesan and basil.

fields.name: Crumb Pie Crust
fields.ingredient_amount: {'butter': ['butter', '2 oz', 'butter'], 'graham-cracker-crumbs': ['graham cracker crumbs', '8 oz', 'graham-cracker-crumbs'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '4 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine the crushed graham crackers, sugar and cinnamon in a mixing bowl. 2 Drizzle in the melted butter, stirring until the crumbs are evenly moistened. 3 Press the crumb mixture evenly in the bottom of a 9" pie pan. 4 Bake the shells at 350F (190C) until the crumbs have toasted slightly and the crust has firmed, approximately 10 to 12 minutes. Fill the parbaked shells as desired.

fields.name: Prigueux Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'truffles-black': ['black truffles', '1/2 oz', 'truffles-black'], 'madeira-sauce': ['Madeira Sauce', '1 qt', 'madeira-sauce'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Add finely diced truffles to Madeira sauce. Prigourdine sauce is the same as prigueux, except that the truffles are cut into relatively thick slices. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Mealy Pie Dough Shell
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mealy-pie-dough': ['Mealy Pie Dough', '2, 10 lb', 'mealy-pie-dough']}
fields.directions: SHAPING CRUSTS  Crusts are shaped by rolling out the dough to fit into a pie pan or tart shell (mold) or to sit on top of fillings. Mealy, flaky and sweet doughs are all easier to roll out and work with if well chilled, as chilling keeps the fat firm and prevents stickiness. When rolling and shaping the dough, work on a clean, flat surface (wood or marble is best). Lightly dust the work surface, rolling pin and dough with pastry flour before starting to roll the dough. Also, work only with a manageable amount at a time: usually one crusts worth for a pie or standard-sized tart or enough for 10 to 12 tartlet shells.

fields.name: Parisian Croissants
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1 oz', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'egg-wash': ['Egg Washas needed', '', 'egg-wash'], 'flour-bread': ['bread flour', '2, 4 lb', 'flour-bread'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '1, 8 lb', 'butter-unsalted'], 'milk': ['milk', '21 fl oz', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 oz', 'salt'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Stir the flour, salt and sugar together in the bowl of a mixer fitted with a dough hook. Warm the milk to approximately 90F (32C). Stir in the yeast. Add the milk-and-yeast mixture to the dry ingredients. Stir until combined, then knead on medium speed for 10 minutes. Place the dough in a large floured bowl, cover and let rise until doubled in size, approximately 1 hour. Prepare the butter while the dough is rising. Place the butter in an even layer between two large pieces of plastic wrap and roll into a flat rectangle, approximately 8 inches X 11 inches (20 centimeters X 27.5 centimeters) and chill. After the dough has risen, punch it down. Roll out the dough into a large rectangle, approximately 1/2 inch (1.2 centimeters) thick and large enough to enclose the rectangle of butter. Place the unwrapped butter in the center of the dough and fold the dough around the butter, enclosing it completely. Roll out the block of dough into a long rectangle, approximately 1 inch (2.5 centimeters) thick. Fold the dough in thirds, a single book fold. This completes the first turn. Wrap the dough in plastic and chill for approximately 20 to 30 minutes. Repeat the rolling and folding process two more times, chilling the dough between each turn. When finished, wrap the dough well and chill it overnight before shaping and baking. To shape the dough into croissant rolls, cut off one-fourth of the block at a time, wrapping the rest and returning it to the refrigerator. Roll each section of dough into a large rectangle, about 1/4 inch (6 millimeters) thick. 10. Cut the dough into uniform triangles. Starting with the large end, roll each triangle into a crescent and place on a paper-lined sheet pan. 11. Brush lightly with egg wash. Proof until doubled, but do not allow the dough to become so warm that the butter melts. 12. Bake at 375F (190C) until golden brown, approximately 12 to 15 minutes.

fields.name: Cherry Confit
fields.ingredient_amount: {'brandy': ['brandy', '1 tbl', 'brandy'], 'onion-red': ['red onion', '2 tbl', 'onion-red'], 'vinegar-sherry': ['sherry vinegar', '1/2 tsp', 'vinegar-sherry'], 'butter': ['butter', '2 tsp', 'butter'], 'cherries-dried': ['dried cherries', '3 oz', 'cherries-dried'], 'wine-port': ['port wine', '1 tbl', 'wine-port']}
fields.directions: Saut the onion in the butter without coloring. Add the cherries. Add the brandy and flamb. Add the wine and vinegar; cook until almost dry. Serve warm or at room temperature with charcuterie items or grilled or roasted meats.

fields.name: Spanish Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'creole-sauce': ['Creole Sauce', '1 qt', 'creole-sauce'], 'olives-black': ['black olivesas needed', '', 'olives-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '4 oz', 'mushrooms-medium']}
fields.directions: Prepare creole sauce as directed, adding 4 ounces (120 grams) sliced mushrooms to the sauted onions. Garnish with sliced black or green olives. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Jumbo Cinnamon Buns
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-instant': ['instant yeast', '2 oz', 'yeast-instant'], 'raisins-dark': ['dark raisins', '12 oz', 'raisins-dark'], 'cinnamon-ground': ['ground cinnamon', '1/2 oz', 'cinnamon-ground'], 'buttermilk': ['buttermilk', '12 fl oz', 'buttermilk'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-light-brown'], 'pecan-halves': ['pecan halves', '12 oz', 'pecan-halves'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 oz', 'salt'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '1 ea', 'eggs'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '3 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '2 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'powdered-sugar-glaze': ['Powdered Sugar Glazeas needed', '', 'powdered-sugar-glaze'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '6 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '5 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with a dough hook, combine the buttermilk, yeast, egg, egg yolks and vanilla. Add the flour, sugar, salt and softened butter. Mix on medium speed until well blended, until a windowpane has been obtained and the dough reaches approximately 75F (24C). Ferment the dough until doubled, approximately 1 hour. Meanwhile, prepare the filling. Whisk together the melted butter, cinnamon and brown sugar. Set aside. Roll the fermented dough into a rectangle measuring 18 inches X 30 inches (45 centimeters X 75 centimeters). Spread the filling evenly over the entire surface of the dough. Sprinkle with the pecans and raisins (if using). Starting with the longer side, roll the dough into a spiral. Cut into 24 pieces, each approximately 1 1/2 inches (3.7 centimeters) thick. Place the rolls close together, cut side up, on a pa-per-lined sheet pan and allow them to rise until the rolls have increased 70 percent in volume. Bake at 350F (180C) until golden brown, approximately 20 to 25 minutes. Cool slightly, then top with Powdered Sugar Glaze.

fields.name: Tomato Syrup
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'cumin-ground': ['ground cumin', '1 pinch', 'cumin-ground'], 'tomato-juice': ['tomato juice', '1 pt', 'tomato-juice'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'chipotle-powder': ['chipotle powder', '1 pinch', 'chipotle-powder']}
fields.directions: 1 In a nonreactive saucepan, reduce the tomato juice by two-thirds. Add the remaining ingredi-ents, stir well and strain through a chinois.

fields.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-balsamic': ['balsamic vinegar', '2 tbl', 'vinegar-balsamic'], 'oil-extra-virgin-olive': ['extra virgin olive oil', '4 tbl', 'oil-extra-virgin-olive'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '2 tsp', 'shallot'], 'oil-canola': ['canola oil', '4 tbl', 'oil-canola'], 'mustard-dijon': ['Dijon mustard', '2 tsp', 'mustard-dijon'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: 1 In a stainless steel bowl, whisk together the vinegar, mustard, shallots, salt and pepper. 2 Combine the oils. Slowly whisk them into the vinegar-and-mustard mixture to form an emul-sified dressing.

fields.name: Tournedos Rossini
fields.ingredient_amount: {'foie-gras-whole-b': ['whole B foie gras', '8 oz', 'foie-gras-whole-b'], 'tournedos-3-oz': ['Tournedos (3 oz)', '8 ea', 'tournedos-3-oz'], 'french-bread-croutons': ['French Bread Croutons', '8 ea', 'french-bread-croutons'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '8 fl oz', 'demi-glace'], 'wine-madeira': ['Madeira wine', '4 fl oz', 'wine-madeira'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'truffle-slices-canned-black': ['canned black truffle slices', '8 slice', 'truffle-slices-canned-black'], 'clarified-butter': ['Clarified Butter', '2 fl oz', 'clarified-butter'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Saut the tournedos in clarified butter to the desired doneness. Place each tournedo on top of a crouton. Top each with a slice of foie gras, then a slice of truffle. Hold in a warm place. Degrease the pan. Deglaze the pan with the wine and add the demi-glace. Reduce the sauce to the desired consistency and adjust the seasonings. Warm the tournedos briefly under a broiler or in the oven. Place two tournedos on each plate. Pour the sauce around the tournedos. Garnish with watercress, sauted asparagus and chteau potatoes.

fields.name: Nantua Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'crayfish-butter': ['Crayfish Butter', '6 oz', 'crayfish-butter'], 'crawfish-tails': ['crawfish tailsas needed', '', 'crawfish-tails'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '4 fl oz', 'cream-heavy'], 'paprika': ['paprika to taste', '', 'paprika'], 'ba-chamel': ['BÃ©chamel', '1 qt', 'ba-chamel'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'pepper-ground-white': ['ground white pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-white']}
fields.directions: Add to bchamel 4 fluid ounces (120 milliliters) heavy cream and 6 ounces (180 grams) crayfish butter (page 212). Add paprika to achieve the desired color. Garnish the finished sauce with diced crayfish meat.

fields.name: Chasseur (Hunter's Sauce)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'wine-white': ['white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'shallot': ['shallot', '1/2 oz', 'shallot'], 'mushrooms-medium': ['medium mushrooms', '4 oz', 'mushrooms-medium'], 'butter': ['butteras needed', '', 'butter'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsleyas needed', '', 'parsley-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'tomatoes-fresh': ['fresh tomatoes', '6 oz', 'tomatoes-fresh'], 'demi-glace': ['Demi-Glace', '1 qt', 'demi-glace']}
fields.directions: Saut 4 ounces (120 grams) sliced mushrooms and 12 ounce (15 grams) diced shallots in whole butter. Add 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) white wine and reduce by three-fourths. Then add demi-glace and 6 ounces (180 grams) diced tomatoes; simmer for 5 minutes. Do not strain. Garnish with chopped parsley. Season  to taste with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Lemongrass Oil
fields.ingredient_amount: {'oil-peanut': ['peanut oil', '10 fl oz', 'oil-peanut'], 'lemongrass': ['lemongrass', '2 oz', 'lemongrass'], 'ginger-fresh': ['fresh ginger', '1 1/4 oz', 'ginger-fresh']}
fields.directions: Place all of the ingredients in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over low heat. Simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and allow the flavored oil to stand overnight at room temperature. Strain before using.

fields.name: Risotto Cakes
fields.ingredient_amount: {'panko': ['panko', '1/2 cup', 'panko'], 'cheese-parmesan': ['parmesan cheese', '2 tbl', 'cheese-parmesan'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '2 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '1 ea', 'eggs'], 'rice-arborio': ['arborio rice', '2, 10 lb', 'rice-arborio'], 'onion': ['onion', '2 oz', 'onion'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 qt', 'chicken-stock'], 'water': ['wateras needed', '', 'water'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flouras needed', '', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'oil-soybean': ['soybean oil', '8 fl oz', 'oil-soybean']}
fields.directions: 1 Heat 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) oil in a deep saut pan. Add the garlic, onion and   teaspoon (3 milliliters) each of salt and pepper. Cook over medium heat until the onion is translucent. 2 Add the rice and saut for 1 to 2 minutes, being careful not to burn the rice. 3 Reduce the heat to medium-low and add   cup (120 milliliters) stock. Cook for approximately 15 minutes, stirring frequently and adding the remaining stock slowly as needed. If additional liquid is needed for the rice to be fully cooked and tender, add hot water. 4 Add the Parmesan and season with salt and pepper. 5 Press the risotto into an even layer on a lightly greased baking sheet. Cool completely in the refrigerator. 6 Cut out six cakes, using a cookie cutter or knife. Bread the cakes with seasoned flour, egg wash and panko, using the standard breading procedure described in Chapter 9, Mise en Place. 7 Heat the remaining soybean oil in a deep saut pan to 340F (171C). Cook the cakes on both sides until golden brown.

fields.name: Beef Stock
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '2 lb', 'mirepoix'], 'bay-leaves-dried': ['dried bay leaves', '2 ea', 'bay-leaves-dried'], 'pepper-whole-black': ['whole black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-whole-black'], 'water': ['water', '3 gal', 'water'], 'parsley-fresh': ['fresh parsley', '12 sprig', 'parsley-fresh'], 'thyme-dried-whole': ['dried whole thyme', '1/2 tsp', 'thyme-dried-whole'], 'garlic-clove': ['garlic clove', '3 ea', 'garlic-clove'], 'beef-bones': ['beef bones', '15 lb', 'beef-bones']}
fields.directions: 1.Cut the washed bones into pieces approximately 34 inches (810 centimeters) long. 2.Place the bones in a stockpot and cover them with cold water. If blanching, bring the water to a boil, skimming off the scum that rises to the surface. Drain off the water and the impurities. Then add the 3 gallons (11.5 liters) cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. 3.If not blanching the bones, bring the cold water to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and skim the scum that forms. 4.Add the mirepoix and sachet to the simmering stock. 5.Continue simmering and skimming the stock for 6 to 8 hours. (If only chicken bones are used, simmer for 3 to 4 hours.) 6.Strain, cool and refrigerate.

fields.name: Pork Scallops
fields.ingredient_amount: {'pork-loin-boneless': ['boneless pork loin', '1 ea', 'pork-loin-boneless']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim pork loin of any fat or silverskin. Using accurate portion scale, cut into scallops of desired size. Place in hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Focaccia (Roman Flatbread)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'yeast-dry-active': ['dry active yeast', '1 tbl', 'yeast-dry-active'], 'onion': ['onion', '3 oz', 'onion'], 'rosemary-fresh': ['fresh rosemary', '2 tbl', 'rosemary-fresh'], 'salt-kosher': ['kosher salt', '2 tsp', 'salt-kosher'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '1 tbl', 'oil-olive'], 'water': ['water', '12 fl oz', 'water'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '1, 2 lb', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1 tbl', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: Combine the sugar, yeast and water. Stir to dissolve the yeast. Stir in the flour 4 ounces (120 grams) at a time. Stir in 1 1/2 teaspoons (7 milliliters) salt and the onion. Mix well, then knead on a lightly floured board or in the bowl of a mixer fitted with a dough hook until smooth. Place the dough in an oiled bowl, cover and ferment until doubled. Punch down the dough, then flatten it onto an oiled sheet pan. It should be no more than 1 inch (2.5 centimeters) thick. Brush the top of the dough with the olive oil. Let the dough proof until doubled, approximately 15 minutes. Sprinkle the rosemary and remaining 1/2 teaspoon (2 milliliters) salt on top of the dough. Bake at 400F (200C) until lightly browned, approximately 20 minutes.

fields.name: Blueberry Muffins
fields.ingredient_amount: {'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '8 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'baking-powder': ['baking powder', '2 tsp', 'baking-powder'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '5 oz', 'sugar-granulated'], 'vanilla-extract': ['vanilla extract', '1 tsp', 'vanilla-extract'], 'eggs': ['eggs', '2 ea', 'eggs'], 'butter-unsalted': ['unsalted butter', '2 oz', 'butter-unsalted'], 'milk': ['milk', '8 fl oz', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/4 tsp', 'salt'], 'blueberries': ['blueberries', '5 oz', 'blueberries'], 'lemon-zest': ['Lemon Zest', '1 tbl', 'lemon-zest']}
fields.directions: Sift together the dry ingredients (flour, sugar, baking powder, salt). Stir together the liquid ingredients (eggs, milk, melted butter, vanilla extract). Stir the liquid mixture into the dry ingredients. Do not overmix. The batter should be lumpy. Gently fold in the blueberries and lemon zest. Portion into greased or paper-lined muffin cups and bake at 350F (180C) until light brown and set in the center, approximately 18 minutes. Cool the muffins in the pan for several minutes before removing.

fields.name: Tomato Olive and Preserved Lemon Sauce
Mopping Sauce

fields.name: Fresh Tomato Sauce for Pasta
fields.ingredient_amount: {'oregano-fresh': ['fresh oregano', '1 tbl', 'oregano-fresh'], 'onion': ['onion', '8 oz', 'onion'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'tomato-concassa': ['Tomato ConcassÃ©', '7 lb', 'tomato-concassa'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '1 tbl', 'garlic'], 'thyme-fresh': ['fresh thyme', '2 tsp', 'thyme-fresh'], 'basil-fresh': ['fresh basil', '1/2 oz', 'basil-fresh'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'carrot': ['carrot', '4 oz', 'carrot']}
fields.directions: Sweat the onion, carrot and garlic in the oil until tender. Add the tomato concasse, oregano and thyme. Simmer for approximately 1 hour or until the desired consistency is reached. Pass the sauce through a food mill if a smooth consistency is desired. Do not pure if a chun-kier sauce is desired. Adjust the seasonings and add the basil.

fields.name: Chocolate Italian Buttercream
fields.ingredient_amount: {'water': ['wateras needed', '', 'water'], 'butter': ['butter', '2, 12 lb', 'butter'], 'egg-whites': ['egg whites', '14 oz', 'egg-whites'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '1, 11 lb', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: All ingredients should be at room temperature before beginning. Place the egg whites in a mixer bowl. Have 9 ounces (270 grams) sugar nearby. Place 1 pound 2 ounces (540 grams) sugar in a heavy saucepan with enough water to moisten. Bring to a boil over high heat, brushing down the sides of the pan with clean water to prevent the sugar from crystallizing. As the sugar syrups temperature approaches soft ball stage (240F/116C), begin whipping the egg whites. Watch the sugar closely so that the temperature does not exceed 240F (116C). When soft peaks form in the egg whites, gradually add 9 ounces (270 grams) sugar to them. Reduce the mixer speed to medium and continue whipping the egg whites to stiff peaks. When the sugar syrup reaches soft ball stage, immediately pour it into the whites while the mixer is running. Pour the syrup in a steady stream between the side of the bowl and the bea-ter. If the syrup hits the beater, it will splatter and cause lumps. Continue beating at medium speed until the egg whites are completely cool. At this point, the product is known as Italian meringue. Gradually add the softened butter to the Italian meringue. When all the butter is incorporated, add flavoring ingredients as desired. 8  Add 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) vanilla extract to the butter-cream, then stir in 10 ounces (300 grams) melted and cooled bittersweet chocolate.

fields.name: Orange Vinaigrette
fields.ingredient_amount: {'vinegar-cider': ['cider vinegar', '1 fl oz', 'vinegar-cider'], 'onion-green': ['green onion', '1 tbl', 'onion-green'], 'orange-juice': ['orange juice', '4 fl oz', 'orange-juice'], 'oil-canola': ['canola oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-canola'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'mustard-dry': ['dry mustard', '1/4 tsp', 'mustard-dry'], 'salt': ['salt', '1/2 tsp', 'salt']}
fields.directions: 1 Combine the orange juice, vinegar, salt, pepper and mustard in the bowl of a food processor or blender. Process to combine. 2 Add the oil and process for 1 minute. Remove from the processor and stir in the green on-ions.

fields.name: Dried Fruit Compote
fields.ingredient_amount: {'peaches-dried': ['dried peaches', '5 oz', 'peaches-dried'], 'cointreau': ['cointreau', '2 fl oz', 'cointreau'], 'glucose': ['glucose', '12 fl oz', 'glucose'], 'water': ['water', '24 fl oz', 'water'], 'pears-dried': ['dried pears', '5 oz', 'pears-dried'], 'apricots-dried': ['dried apricots', '5 oz', 'apricots-dried'], 'prunes-pitted': ['pitted prunes', '5 oz', 'prunes-pitted'], 'cinnamon-stick': ['cinnamon stick', '1 ea', 'cinnamon-stick']}
fields.directions: Coarsely chop the fruits. Place the pieces in a nonreactive saucepan and add the water and cinnamon stick.  Bring the mixture to a simmer, cover and cook until tender, approximately 12 to 15 minutes.  Add the glucose syrup and Cointreau. Simmer uncovered until thoroughly heated. Remove the cinnamon stick. Serve warm or refrigerate for longer storage.

fields.name: Broiled Grapefruit
fields.ingredient_amount: {'sherry-sweet': ['sweet sherry', '2 tbl', 'sherry-sweet'], 'grapefruit-ruby-red': ['ruby red grapefruit', '4 ea', 'grapefruit-ruby-red'], 'sugar-light-brown': ['light brown sugar', '4 tbl', 'sugar-light-brown']}
fields.directions: Cut each grapefruit in half (perpendicular to the segments), then section with a sharp knife, carefully removing any visible seeds. Sprinkle the grapefruit halves with the sherry and sugar. Arrange on a baking sheet and place under a preheated broiler. Cook briefly, only until well heated and the sugar caramelizes. Serve immediately.

fields.name: Opal Basil Oil

fields.directions: 1 With a small wand blender, blend the basil and olive oil. Hold for 24 hours and then strain through cheesecloth.

fields.name: Bolognese Sauce
fields.ingredient_amount: {'mirepoix': ['Mirepoix', '8 oz', 'mirepoix'], 'beef-ground': ['ground beef', '1 lb', 'beef-ground'], 'tomato-concassa': ['Tomato ConcassÃ©', '2 lb', 'tomato-concassa'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'nutmeg-ground': ['ground nutmeg to taste', '', 'nutmeg-ground'], 'oil-olive': ['olive oil', '2 fl oz', 'oil-olive'], 'white-stock': ['White Stock', '8 fl oz', 'white-stock'], 'butter': ['butter', '1 oz', 'butter'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'milk': ['milk', '6 fl oz', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt']}
fields.directions: Saut the mirepoix in the oil and butter until tender. Add the beef and cook until no pink remains. Drain fat if necessary. Add the wine. Cook and reduce the wine until nearly dry. Add the milk and season with nutmeg. Cook and reduce the milk until nearly dry. Add the tomato concasse and 8 fluid ounces (240 milliliters) stock; season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 112 to 2 hours, adding stock only if needed to prevent scorching. Adjust the seasonings.

fields.name: Orange Gastrique
fields.ingredient_amount: {'orange-juice-fresh': ['Orange Juice (fresh)', '1 pt', 'orange-juice-fresh'], 'brown-stock': ['Brown Stock', '2 qt', 'brown-stock'], 'water': ['water', '4 fl oz', 'water'], 'butter': ['butter', '1/2 oz', 'butter'], 'honey': ['honey', '3 tbl', 'honey'], 'orange-zest': ['Orange Zest', '2 tbl', 'orange-zest'], 'star-anise-whole': ['whole star anise', '2 ea', 'star-anise-whole'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '8 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}

Stir in the honey and mont au beurre. Serve the sauce with grilled or roasted chicken, duck, quail or pork.

fields.name: Bavarian Cream
fields.ingredient_amount: {'gelatin-sheet': ['sheet gelatin', '3/4 oz', 'gelatin-sheet'], 'vanilla-bean': ['vanilla bean', '1 ea', 'vanilla-bean'], 'cream-heavy': ['heavy cream', '1 qt', 'cream-heavy'], 'egg-yolks': ['egg yolks', '8 ea', 'egg-yolks'], 'milk': ['milk', '14 fl oz', 'milk'], 'sugar-granulated': ['granulated sugar', '6 oz', 'sugar-granulated']}
fields.directions: To prepare the custard sauce, combine the milk, cream, 2 ounces (60 grams) sugar and the vanilla bean in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil. Whisk the egg yolks and remaining 4 ounces (120 grams) sugar together to the ribbon stage. Temper the yolk mixture with one-quarter of the heated milk, whisking constantly. Pour the egg mixture into the saucepan with the rest of the milk. Stir constantly with a rubber spatula until the custard reaches 185F (85C). Remove the custard from the heat and pour it through a fine mesh strainer into a clean bowl. Add the softened gelatin to the hot custard. Chill until thick in an ice bath, until the custard reaches 75F (24C) or slightly cooler. Fold in the whipped cream. Pour the Bavarian cream immediately into serving dishes or a ladyfinger-lined mold. Chill completely before serving. Note: Gelatin may separate in the freezer, so quick chilling is not recommended. Products made with gelatin keep well for 1 to 2 days but stiffen with age. VARIATION: Charlotte BavarianLine a 221/2-quart (22.5-liter) charlotte mold with ladyfingers (page 1043), then fill with alternating layers of fruit and Bavarian cream. Chill completely, then invert onto a serving platter when firm and garnish with whipped cream.

fields.name: Orange Glaze

fields.directions: 1 Combine the ingredients using a spatula.

fields.name: Glace de Volaille
fields.ingredient_amount: {'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 gal', 'chicken-stock']}
fields.directions: Simmer the stock over very low heat. Be careful not to let it burn, and skim it often. As it reduces and the volume decreases, transfer the liquid into progressively smaller sauce-pans. Strain the liquid each time it is transferred into a smaller saucepan. Strain it a final time, cool and refrigerate. A properly made glaze will keep for several months under refrigeration.

fields.name: Black Bean Spread

fields.directions: Combine the beans and the water, bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer and cook until tender, approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer for 10 minutes. Drain the beans, reserving the cooking liquid. Chill the beans and the liquid. Pure the beans in a food processor, adding enough of the cooking liquid to make a soft, spreadable pure.

fields.name: Red Pepper Coulis
fields.ingredient_amount: {'onion': ['onion', '3 oz', 'onion'], 'wine-white': ['white wine', '8 fl oz', 'wine-white'], 'chicken-stock': ['Chicken Stock', '1 pt', 'chicken-stock'], 'pepper-ground-black': ['ground black pepper to taste', '', 'pepper-ground-black'], 'garlic': ['garlic', '2 tsp', 'garlic'], 'pepper-red-bell': ['red bell pepper', '3 lb', 'pepper-red-bell'], 'salt': ['salt to taste', '', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '1 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable']}

Add the stock, bring to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Pure in a blender or food processor and strain through a china cap. Adjust the consistency and seasonings and hold for service.

fields.directions: Heat the cream to approximately 100F (43C). Remove the cream from the heat and stir in the buttermilk. Allow the mixture to stand in a warm place, loosely covered, until it thickens, approximately 12 to 36 hours. Chill thoroughly before using. Crme frache will keep for up to 10 days in the refrigerator.

fields.name: Beef Consomm

fields.directions: Whip the eggssss whites until slightly frothy. Combine the eggssss whites, beef, mirepoix and tomatoes in an appropriate stockpot. Add the broth or stock; mix well and add the onions brls and sachet. Bring the mixture to a simmer over moderate heat, stirring occasionally. Stop stirring when the raft begins to form. Break a hole in the center of the raft to allow the consomm to bubble through. Simmer until full flavor develops, approximately 112 hours. Strain through several layers of cheesecloth, degrease and adjust the seasonings. Cool and refrigerate or hold for service. Note: Guidelines for garnishing consomms as well as some classic garnishes are listed on page 252.

fields.name: Beef Bottom Round Steaks (6 oz)
fields.ingredient_amount: {'beef-bottom-round': ['beef bottom round', '13.5 ea', 'beef-bottom-round']}
fields.directions: Working on a meat-designated cutting board - trim meat of all excess fat and sliverskin. Using accurate scale - cut 6 oz portions. Layout on paper-lined hotel pan or paper-lined sheet pan. Cover with plastic wrap, label with date, and place in walk-in refrigerator.

fields.name: Popovers
fields.ingredient_amount: {'eggs': ['eggs', '6 ea', 'eggs'], 'butter': ['butter', '3 oz', 'butter'], 'flour-all-purpose': ['all purpose flour', '8 oz', 'flour-all-purpose'], 'milk': ['milk', '1 pt', 'milk'], 'salt': ['salt', '1 tsp', 'salt'], 'oil-vegetable': ['vegetable oil', '10 fl oz', 'oil-vegetable']}
fields.directions: Place twenty 4-ounce (120-milliliter) greased ramekins or popover tins on a sheet pan and drop 1 tablespoon (15 milliliters) of beef fat or vegetable oil in the bottom of each ramekin. Place the ramekins in a 425F (220C) oven until the fat smokes. Sift the flour and salt together into a large bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk and butter. Pour the liquid ingredients into the dry ingredients and whip until smooth. Remove the ramekins from the oven and fill each approximately two-thirds full with batter. Bake at 425F (220C) for 20 minutes without opening the oven door. After 20 minutes, lower the heat to 375F (190C) and bake until the popovers dry out inside, approximately 10 more minutes. Remove the popovers from the oven, unmold and serve. For crisper popovers, slit the sides of the unmolded popovers to allow the steam to escape. Place on a sheet pan and return them to the oven until the tops are firm, crisp and brown, ap-proximately 10 minutes.

fields.name: Lobster Butter
